translation.zh: 过度关注占星术的细节是迷信之一，它对印度教徒造成了很大的伤害。

translation.en: May you all be blessed, ever blessed, my dear, dear sisters.
translation.zh: 愿你们都蒙福，永远蒙福，我亲爱的姐妹们。

translation.en: Marriage and sex and money are the only living devils.
translation.zh: 婚姻、性和金钱是唯一活着的魔鬼。

translation.en: And if the plantain-leaf, which sometimes serves the purpose of a plate, is torn, there is a good chance of the soup getting mixed up with the moist floor and cow-dung paste and giving rise to a wonderful taste!
translation.zh: 如果有时用作盘子的芭蕉叶被撕裂，汤很有可能与潮湿的地板和牛粪糊混合在一起，产生美妙的味道！

translation.zh: 19 W. 38TH ST.， 纽约

translation.en: What a horror — even a father and mother allow their ten-year-old daughter to be given in marriage to a full-grown fat husband!
translation.zh: 真是太可怕了——即使是父亲和母亲也允许他们十岁的女儿嫁给一个成年的胖丈夫！

translation.en: I think we should love our brother whether we believe in the universal fatherhood of God or not, because every religion and every creed recognises man as divine, and you should do him no harm that you might not injure that which is divine in him."
translation.zh: 我认为无论我们是否相信上帝的普遍父性，我们都应该爱我们的兄弟，因为每个宗教和每个信条都承认人是神圣的，你不应该伤害他，以免伤害他里面的神圣。

translation.en: "When the Jiva is sought to be united with Brahman it is best, when meditation is practiced it is mediocre, repetition of names is the lowest form, and external worship is the lowest of the low."
translation.zh: “当吉瓦寻求与婆罗门结合时，这是最好的，当练习冥想时，它是平庸的，重复名字是最低的形式，而外在的崇拜是最低的。”

translation.en: That gives us consolation, because, if it is only habit, we can make and unmake it at any time.
translation.zh: 这给了我们安慰，因为，如果它只是习惯，我们可以随时制造和取消它。

translation.en: He becomes a sage who, of these two, takes up that which leads to blessedness, and he degenerates who takes up the road to enjoyment.
translation.zh: 他成为圣人，在这两个人中，他走上了通往幸福的道路，而他堕落了，走上了享受的道路。

translation.en: So in this renunciation auxiliary to devotion, there is no harshness, no dryness no struggle, nor repression nor suppression.
translation.zh: 因此，在这种与奉献相辅相成的放弃中，没有苛刻，没有干涩，没有挣扎，没有压抑，也没有压抑。

translation.en: Even the greatest fool can accomplish a task if it be after his heart. But the intelligent man is he who can convert every work into one that suits his taste. No work is petty. Everything in this world is like a banyan-seed, which, though appearing tiny as a mustard-seed, has yet the gigantic banyan tree latent within it. He indeed is intelligent who notices this and succeeds in making all work truly great. (This paragraph only is translated from Bengali.)
translation.zh: 即使是最大的傻瓜，如果按照他的心，也能完成一项任务。但聪明的人是能够将每件作品都转化为适合他口味的作品的人。没有工作是微不足道的。这个世界上的一切都像一粒榕树，虽然它看起来像芥菜籽一样小，但里面却潜伏着一棵巨大的榕树。他确实很聪明，他注意到了这一点，并成功地使所有工作都真正伟大。（本段仅翻译自孟加拉语。

translation.en: We have been existing eternally, and will exist, and there is no power under the sun or above the sun which can undo your or my existence or send us back to zero.
translation.zh: 我们一直存在，并将存在，在太阳之下或太阳之上没有任何力量可以取消你或我的存在或将我们送回零。

translation.en: I made quite a little run through Ireland and some of the Old English towns and now am once more in Reading amidst Brahma and Maya and Jiva, the individual and the universal soul, etc.
translation.zh: 我跑遍了爱尔兰和一些古老的英国城镇，现在又一次在雷丁，在梵天、玛雅和吉瓦、个人和宇宙灵魂等中间。

translation.en: It is a strange fact that Oxford and Cambridge are closed to women today, so are Harvard and Yale; but Calcutta University opened its doors to women more than twenty years ago.
translation.zh: 一个奇怪的事实是，牛津大学和剑桥大学今天对女性关闭，哈佛大学和耶鲁大学也是如此。但加尔各答大学在二十多年前就向女性敞开了大门。

translation.en: "I am the thread that runs through all these various ideas, each one of which is; like a pearl," says the Lord Krishna; and it is the duty of Vedanta to establish this connecting thread, how ever incongruous or disgusting may seem these ideas when judged according to the conceptions of today.
translation.zh: “我是贯穿所有这些不同想法的线索，每个想法都是;像珍珠一样，“克里希纳勋爵说;吠檀多的职责是建立这条连接线，当根据今天的概念来判断时，这些想法看起来多么不协调或令人作呕。

translation.en: First, let us see about their respective ideas of cleanliness of the body.
translation.zh: 首先，让我们看看他们各自对身体清洁的看法。

translation.en: Swamiji: The end and the means are all in your hands. I can only stimulate them. You have read so many scriptures and are serving and associating with such Sadhus who have known Brahman; if even this does not bring the idea of renunciation, then your life is in vain. But it will not be altogether vain; the effects of this will manifest in some way or other in time.
translation.zh: 斯瓦米吉：目的和手段都掌握在你手中。我只能刺激他们。你读了那么多经文，正在服侍和交往这些认识婆罗门的萨杜斯;如果连这都不能带来出离心的想法，那么你的生命就是徒劳的。但这不会完全是徒劳的;这种影响会以某种方式及时显现出来。

translation.en: But if happiness were eternal, misery also would be eternal, just think of that.
translation.zh: 但是，如果幸福是永恒的，那么痛苦也是永恒的，想想看。

translation.en: We dream that which we think we will do.
translation.zh: 我们梦想着我们认为我们会做的事情。

translation.en: Did any of them write a fine book on philosophy, on the most intricate ratiocinations of logic?
translation.zh: 他们中有人写过一本关于哲学的好书，关于逻辑中最复杂的比率？

translation.en: You are nobody, nor am I, nor anyone else.
translation.zh: 你不是任何人，我也不是，也不是其他人。

translation.en: The throne with the princess came near him, and as soon as she saw the beautiful Sannyasin, she stopped and threw the garland over him.
translation.zh: 公主的宝座靠近他，她一看到美丽的桑雅生，就停了下来，把花环扔在他身上。

translation.en: Startling, gigantic, impressive, world-moving persons stand before us, as it were, for the first time, sometimes of more magnitude even than their teachings.
translation.zh: 令人吃惊的、巨大的、令人印象深刻的、感动世界的人物站在我们面前，这似乎是第一次，有时甚至比他们的教义还要重要。

translation.en: At first I found myself in a critical position, owing to the hostile attitude assumed against the people of this country by those who went there from India.
translation.zh: 起初，我发现自己处于一个关键的位置，因为那些从印度来到这个国家的人对这个国家的人民采取了敌对态度。

translation.en: All our struggles and hopes and fears and joys, what will they lead to?
translation.zh: 我们所有的挣扎、希望、恐惧和喜悦，它们会带来什么？

translation.en: I once attempted it when I was a boy, but it could not be.
translation.zh: 当我还是个孩子的时候，我曾经尝试过，但不可能。

translation.en: No more will you think of man as evil; and that is the first great gain.
translation.zh: 你不再认为人是邪恶的;这是第一个巨大的收获。

translation.en: Even if I am bound to eat it under certain circumstances, I know it is cruel.
translation.zh: 即使我在某些情况下必须吃它，我知道它是残忍的。

translation.en: The saying of the great poet and the prince of Bhaktas, Tulasidâsa, "A person who intensely loves another is sure to find him", has been fully realised today.
translation.zh: 伟大的诗人和巴克塔斯的王子图拉西达萨（Tulasidâsa）的名言“一个深爱另一个人的人一定会找到他”，今天已经完全实现。

translation.en: No army, then, carries the banner of so wide an Empire as that of Hinduism, thus defined.
translation.zh: 因此，没有哪支军队能像印度教那样高举帝国的旗帜。

translation.en: Then and then alone, all sectarian quarrels will cease, and we shall be in a position to understand, to bring to our hearts, to embrace, to intensely love the very word Hindu and every one who bears that name.
translation.zh: 到那时，所有宗派争吵都会停止，我们将能够理解，带入我们的心灵，拥抱，强烈地爱印度教这个词和每一个以这个名字命名的人。

translation.en: Too late, the knowledge age doth gain;
translation.zh: 为时已晚，知识年龄确实有所增长;

translation.en: Then at the end of the Kalpa; everything subsides, and goes back to Akasha and Prana.
translation.zh: 然后在卡尔帕的尽头;一切都平息了，回到了阿卡莎和普拉纳。

translation.en: One thing is taken for another, not as something that does not exist.
translation.zh: 一件事被当作另一件事，而不是不存在的东西。

translation.en: I do not want to lose this opportunity of working in London. And so your invitation, coupled with the London one, is, I know, a divine call for further work.
translation.zh: 我不想失去在伦敦工作的机会。因此，我知道，你的邀请，加上伦敦的邀请，是对进一步工作的神圣呼唤。

translation.en: Our present consciousness is only a little bit of an infinite sea of mind. Do not be limited to this consciousness.
translation.zh: 我们现在的意识只是无限心灵海洋的一点点。不要局限于这种意识。

translation.en: And as regards their virtues: what kindness, what noble thought and action!
translation.zh: 至于他们的美德：多么善良，多么高尚的思想和行动！

translation.en: You have all heard of that rich man in Rome who learnt one day that he had only about a million pounds of his property left; he said, "What shall I do tomorrow?"
translation.zh: 你们都听说过罗马的那个富人，有一天他得知他的财产只剩下大约一百万英镑了。他说：“我明天该怎么办？

translation.en: Now I am staying on the sea-coast of France. The session of the Congress of History of Religions is over. It was not a big affair; some twenty scholars chattered a lot on the origin of the Shâlagrâma and the origin of Jehovah, and similar topics. I also said something on the occasion.
translation.zh: 现在我住在法国的海边。宗教史大会的会议结束了。这不是一件大事;大约有二十位学者喋喋不休地谈论沙拉格拉玛的起源和耶和华的起源，以及类似的话题。我当时也说了些什么。

translation.en: They blackened my character from city to city, poor and friendless though I was in a foreign country.
translation.zh: 他们把我的性格从一个城市抹黑到另一个城市，虽然我在异国他乡，但又穷又没有朋友。

translation.en: Religion was aptly illustrated by the story of the blind men who each felt of a portion of a huge elephant, and each thought the animal like the particular part he felt of it; so with religion each of the various sects have a part of the whole truth, while truth itself is infinite and no man can say "I have seen it all."
translation.zh: 盲人的故事恰如其分地说明了宗教，他们每个人都感觉到一头大象的一部分，每个人都认为动物喜欢他所感觉到的特定部分;因此，对于宗教来说，每个教派都有全部真理的一部分，而真理本身是无限的，没有人可以说“我已经看到了一切”。

translation.en: Therefore, the one work his whole life showed was to call upon them to realise their own spiritual nature.
translation.zh: 因此，他一生所展示的一件作品就是呼吁他们实现自己的精神本质。

translation.en: It would be worth a man's while to place some ideas in the heart of this great machine, so that they might circulate to the remotest part."
translation.zh: 值得一个人花时间把一些想法放在这台伟大机器的核心，这样它们就可以传播到最遥远的地方。

translation.en: The warrior lay prostrate on his face according to the prescribed form of his religion.
translation.zh: 战士按照他宗教的规定形式匍匐在他的脸上。

translation.zh: 如果是爱，我们会看到自己在那股浪潮中的反映，并说我们是爱的。

translation.en: But I do not contradict his conclusion that in transcendent knowledge there is no touch of any work whatsoever.
translation.zh: 但我并不反对他的结论，即在超验知识中，没有任何工作。

translation.en: One English, and one German man-of-war came in; the rest are either cargo or passenger ships.
translation.zh: 一个英国人和一个德国人进来了;其余的要么是货船，要么是客船。

translation.en: Our fundamental idea is that your doctrine cannot be mine, nor mine yours.
translation.zh: 我们的基本思想是，你的教义不能是我的，也不能是我的。

translation.en: The Tantras, as we have said, represent the Vedic rituals in a modified form; and before any one jumps into the most absurd conclusions about them, I will advise him to read the Tantras in conjunction with the Brahmanas, especially the Adhvaryu portion.
translation.zh: 正如我们所说，密宗以修改后的形式代表了吠陀仪式;在任何人对它们得出最荒谬的结论之前，我会建议他将密宗与婆罗门一起阅读，尤其是 Adhvaryu 部分。

translation.en: God is the material cause of this universe, but not really, only apparently.
translation.zh: 上帝是这个宇宙的物质原因，但不是真的，只是表面上的。

translation.en: "Mother, Thy light stops not for the saint or the sinner; it animates the lover and the murderer."
translation.zh: “母亲，你的光不为圣人或罪人而停止;它使情人和凶手充满活力。

translation.en: Millions of moons, millions of suns,
translation.zh: 数以百万计的月亮，数以百万计的太阳，

translation.en: Knowing that the Lord is everywhere, the sages give up praising and blaming.
translation.zh: 知道主无处不在，圣人放弃了赞美和责备。

translation.en: Bring your own lotus to blossom: the bees will come of themselves.
translation.zh: 带上你自己的莲花开花：蜜蜂会自己来。

translation.en: So there is an Infinite beyond; and religion has to deal with both — with the little lump we call our world, and with the Infinite beyond.
translation.zh: 所以有一个无限的超越;宗教必须同时处理这两个问题——我们称之为世界的小块，以及无限的超越。

translation.en: The one says, build a good house, let us have good clothes and food, intellectual culture, and so on, for this is the whole of life; and in that he is immensely practical.
translation.zh: 一个说，盖好房子，让我们有好衣服好吃好，有知识文化，等等，因为这是生活的全部;在这一点上，他非常实用。

translation.en: Now and then you will find they are very much tortured by the idea of sin, but the Upanishads have no place for the delineation of these things.
translation.zh: 你时不时地会发现，他们被罪的观念折磨得很厉害，但奥义书却没有地方来描述这些事情。

translation.en: An intellectual, heartless man never becomes an inspired man.
translation.zh: 一个有智慧、冷酷无情的人永远不会成为一个受启发的人。

translation.en: The best principles in our lives were those which we heard from our mothers through our ears.
translation.zh: 我们生命中最好的原则是我们通过耳朵从母亲那里听到的原则。

translation.en: That should never and nowhere be the ideal of the householder.
translation.zh: 这绝不应该，也绝不是户主的理想。

translation.en: The agnostics say they cannot know God, and rightly, for they have exhausted the limits of their senses and yet get no further in knowledge of God.
translation.zh: 不可知论者说他们不能认识上帝，这是正确的，因为他们已经穷尽了感官的极限，却没有进一步认识上帝。

translation.en: The philosopher, in the same way, may denounce every man who does not have knowledge.
translation.zh: 同样，哲学家可以谴责每一个没有知识的人。

translation.en: I copy his address in full, but I can only suggest its effect upon the audience; for he is an orator by Divine right, and his strong intelligent face in its picturesque setting of yellow and orange was hardly less interesting than these earnest words and the rich rhythmical utterance he gave them."
translation.zh: 我全文抄录了他的讲话，但我只能暗示它对听众的影响;因为他是神圣的演说家，在风景如画的黄色和橙色的环境中，他坚强而聪明的脸庞，几乎不亚于这些恳切的话语和他给出的丰富而有节奏的话语。

translation.en: The outburst of national life was round colleges of sages and spiritual teachers.
translation.zh: 国家生活的爆发是围绕着圣人和精神导师的学院。

translation.en: Just as we go out with the sum total of our present actions upon us, so we see that we come into it with the sum total of our past actions upon us; that which takes us out is the very same thing that brings us in.
translation.zh: 正如我们带着我们目前行为的总和出去一样，我们看到我们带着我们过去行为的总和进入它;把我们带出去的东西和把我们带进来的东西是一样的。

translation.en: "Even if you have known the secret that you have no duty, that you are free, still you have to work for the good of others. Because whatever a great man does, ordinary people will do also. (Ibid. 20-21.) If a great man who has attained peace of mind and freedom ceases to work, then all the rest without that knowledge and peace will try to imitate him, and thus confusion would arise. (Ibid. 22-24.)
translation.zh: “即使你知道你没有义务的秘密，你是自由的，你仍然必须为他人的利益而工作。因为无论伟人做什么，普通人也会做。“（同上，第20-21页）如果一个获得心灵平静和自由的伟人停止工作，那么所有其他没有这种知识和平静的人都会试图模仿他，从而产生混乱。“（同上，第22-24页）

translation.en: This is the highest form of Para-Bhakti — the worship of such an all-comprehending ideal as the ideal; all the other forms of Bhakti are only stages on the way to reach it.
translation.zh: 这是 Para-Bhakti 的最高形式——崇拜这样一个无所不知的理想;所有其他形式的巴克提只是达到它的阶段。

translation.en: Then I will say, "Here is the glass", and then take my mind off, and it disappears
translation.zh: 然后我会说，“这是玻璃杯”，然后把我的思绪移开，它就消失了

translation.en: If you want to be a Yogi, you must be free and place yourself in circumstances where you are alone and free from all anxiety.
translation.zh: 如果你想成为一名瑜伽士，你必须是自由的，把自己放在一个你孤独的环境中，没有所有的焦虑。

translation.en: The man who is groping through sin, through misery, the man who is choosing the path through hells, will reach it, but it will take time.
translation.zh: 在罪恶中摸索的人，在苦难中摸索的人，在地狱中选择道路的人，将到达它，但这需要时间。

translation.en: That is the way to making the perception superfine; and then he goes on to tell us other ways.
translation.zh: 这是使感知变得超精细的方法;然后他继续告诉我们其他方法。

translation.en: So in judging of those ancient religions we must not take the standpoint to which we incline, but must put ourselves into the position of thought and life of those early times.
translation.zh: 因此，在评判这些古老的宗教时，我们不能采取我们倾向于的立场，而必须把自己放在那些早期的思想和生活的位置上。

translation.en: Yes, I am your brother, and you are my brothers.
translation.zh: 是的，我是你的兄弟，你是我的兄弟。

translation.en: Did you write to Miss [Sarah Ellen] Waldo about the publication of the books? I get no news and, what is more important, no money (that is between you and me) from the sale.
translation.zh: 你有没有写信给[莎拉·艾伦]沃尔多小姐关于这些书的出版？我没有得到任何消息，更重要的是，没有钱（在你和我之间）从销售中得到。

translation.en: I have written to you already to secure a place.
translation.zh: 我已经写信给你了，以确保一个位置。

translation.en: One great saint prayed, "Let me go to hell with the sins of the whole world, but let the world be saved."
translation.zh: 一位伟大的圣徒祷告说：“让我带着全世界的罪孽下地狱，但愿世界得救。

translation.en: The ancient sacrifices and the ancient gods, they are all gone; modern India belongs to the spiritual part of the Vedas.
translation.zh: 远古的祭祀和远古的神灵，都消失了;现代印度属于吠陀经的精神部分。

translation.en: If the soul is independent, how then can it be isolated from the infinite whole?
translation.zh: 如果灵魂是独立的，那么它怎么能与无限的整体隔离开来呢？

translation.en: It is not your duty to prove that I got my inspiration from a certain god, but mine, because I produced the proposition to you.
translation.zh: 证明我的灵感不是从某个神那里得到的，而是我的，因为我向你提出了这个命题。

translation.en: It is not a question of one or two days, of years, or of lives; the struggle may have to go on for hundreds of lifetimes.
translation.zh: 这不是一两天、几年或生命的问题;这场斗争可能要持续数百辈子。

translation.en: Their sleep is never disturbed, their nice little brown studies of lives never rudely shocked by the wail of woe, of misery, of degradation, and poverty, that has filled the Indian atmosphere — the result of centuries of oppression.
translation.zh: 他们的睡眠从不被打扰，他们对生活的漂亮的棕色小研究从不被充满印度气氛的悲哀、苦难、堕落和贫困的哀嚎粗鲁地震惊——这是几个世纪以来压迫的结果。

translation.en: You are the only sentient being; mind is only the instrument through which you catch the external world.
translation.zh: 你是唯一的有情众生;头脑只是你捕捉外部世界的工具。

translation.en: The greatest weakness often insinuates itself as the greatest good and strength.
translation.zh: 最大的弱点往往暗示自己是最大的善和力量。

translation.en: The Jew thinks his Holy of Holies can be contained in a box or chest, with an angel on guard on either side.
translation.zh: 犹太人认为他的至圣所可以装在一个盒子或箱子里，两边都有一个天使守卫。

translation.en: Where are the Romans, at the tramp of whose cohorts the world trembled?

translation.zh: 在现实中，你既不去也不来，你既不出生，也不重生;你是无限的，永远在场的，超越所有的因果关系，永远自由。

translation.en: A man from the highest caste and a man from the lowest may become a monk in India, and the two castes become equal.
translation.zh: 在印度，一个来自最高种姓的人和一个来自最低种姓的人可以成为僧侣，两个种姓变得平等。

translation.en: After a time he got tired of his aboriginal queen, and got more men and more girls from India and himself married a girl named Anurâdhâ, discarding his first aboriginal wife.
translation.zh: 过了一段时间，他厌倦了他的原住民女王，从印度得到了更多的男人和女孩，他自己娶了一个名叫阿努拉德的女孩，抛弃了他的第一位原住民妻子。

translation.en: As for Sturdy, I do not know what his opinions are.
translation.zh: 至于斯特迪，我不知道他的意见是什么。

translation.en: A thing dimly perceived we call by one name; the same thing when fully perceived we call by another. The higher the moral nature, the higher the perception and the stronger the will.
translation.zh: 一个模糊的事物，我们用一个名字来称呼;同样的事情，当我们完全感知到时，我们称之为另一个人。道德本质越高，感知力越高，意志越强。

translation.en: Even to the Mohammedan Rule we owe that great blessing, the destruction of exclusive privilege.
translation.zh: 甚至对伊斯兰教的统治，我们也应该有这种伟大的祝福，即对排他性特权的破坏。

translation.en: Are the marriages of the different Varnas to take place from the upper to the lower Varna in the successive order, as in Manu's days, and as it is still in vogue in Nepal?
translation.zh: 不同瓦尔纳的婚姻是否像摩奴时代那样，按照从上瓦尔纳到下瓦尔纳的顺序进行，并且在尼泊尔仍然很流行？

translation.en: I may be weak, but when She says this is so — She can never make mistakes — it must be so.
translation.zh: 我可能很软弱，但当她说这是这样的时候——她永远不会犯错——一定是这样。

translation.en: Now, we all shout like these drunken men," Universal brotherhood!

translation.zh: 说说哪些瓦利王国和古哈卡王国被拉马钱德拉吞并？

translation.en: "Without self, there would have been no religious system. If man had not wanted anything for himself, do you think he would have had all this praying and worship? Why! he would never have thought of God at all, except perhaps for a little praise now and then, at the sight of a beautiful landscape or something. And that is the only attitude there ought to be. All praise and thanks. If only we were rid of self!
translation.zh: “没有自我，就没有宗教体系。如果人不想要任何东西，你认为他会有这么多的祈祷和敬拜吗？为什么！他根本不会想到上帝，除了偶尔看到美丽的风景或其他东西时，也许会赞美一下。这是唯一应该有的态度。所有的赞美和感谢。要是我们摆脱自我就好了！

translation.en: At best, it would only be a very healthy rich man's life, with plenty of sense-enjoyments and a sound body which knows no disease.
translation.zh: 充其量，这只是一个非常健康的富人的生活，拥有丰富的感官享受和健全的身体，不知道疾病。

translation.en: The secret of Greek Art is its imitation of nature even to the minutest details; whereas the secret of Indian Art is to represent the ideal. The energy of the Greek painter is spent in perhaps painting a piece of flesh, and he is so successful that a dog is deluded into taking it to be a real bit of meat and so goes to bite it. Now, what glory is there in merely imitating nature? Why not place an actual bit of flesh before the dog?
translation.zh: 希腊艺术的秘诀在于它对自然的模仿，即使是最微小的细节;而印度艺术的秘诀是代表理想。希腊画家的精力可能花在画一块肉上，他是如此成功，以至于一只狗被欺骗，把它当成一块真正的肉，所以去咬它。那么，仅仅模仿自然又有什么荣耀呢？为什么不在狗面前放一点真正的肉呢？

translation.en: Many thanks for the prompt sending of the books. They will sell quick, I believe. You have become worse than me in changing your plans, I see. I wonder why I have not got any Awakened India yet. My mail is getting so knocked about, I am afraid.
translation.zh: 非常感谢您及时寄出书籍。我相信他们会很快卖掉。我明白了，你在改变计划方面变得比我更糟糕。我想知道为什么我还没有得到任何觉醒的印度。恐怕我的邮件被撞得乱七八糟。

translation.en: They severe written in language archaic and simple; their grammar was very crude, so much so that it was said that some part of the Vedas had no meaning.

translation.zh: 一盏灯，一个人伪造一个名字，另一个人为饥荒开一张一千美元的支票，照在两者上，没有区别。光不知邪恶;你和我使它成为善或恶。

translation.en: One man's nature is emotional, another's intellectual, another's active, and so forth.
translation.zh: 一个人的本性是感性的，另一个人是理智的，另一个人是活跃的，等等。

translation.en: This Akasha vibrates under the action of Prana, and when the next Srishti is coming up, as the vibration becomes quicker, the Akasha is lashed into all these wave forms which we call suns, moons, and systems.
translation.zh: 这个阿卡莎在普拉纳的作用下振动，当下一个 Srishti 出现时，随着振动变得更快，阿卡莎被鞭打成所有这些波形，我们称之为太阳、月亮和系统。

translation.zh: 然而，这确实是通往宗教的唯一道路。

translation.zh: 6.“精神必须像精神一样显现出来。

translation.zh: 光有阳光是不够的;你必须有一双眼睛才能看到它。

translation.zh: 在一个国家，政治权力是它的生命力，就像在英国一样，在另一个国家，艺术生活是它的活力，等等。

translation.zh: 他一个善意的眼神是最大的帮助;他的祝福只是对国家的致敬，高于一切。

translation.en: We shall start for Khetri tomorrow. Gradually the luggage has greatly increased. After Khetri I intend to send everybody to the Math. I could get done through them none of the work which I had hoped. That is to say, it is quite certain that none of them can do anything if he always remains with me. Unless each goes about independently, he will not be able to do anything. The fact is, who will care for them if they are in my company? Only waste of time. So I am sending them to the Math.
translation.zh: 我们明天将出发前往赫特里。渐渐地，行李大大增加了。在 Khetri 之后，我打算让每个人都去数学。我无法通过他们完成我所希望的任何工作。也就是说，可以肯定的是，如果他一直和我在一起，他们都无能为力。除非每个人都独立行动，否则他将无能为力。事实是，如果他们在我的公司，谁来照顾他们？只是浪费时间。所以我把他们送到数学上。

translation.zh: 我也不认为任何制度都可以通过在目前情况下自然而然地聚集在每种方法周围的欺诈和失败来判断。

translation.zh: 你是否通过做出所有必要的安排来完成我的杜尔加节。

translation.zh: 佛教徒在理智上是无所不包的毁灭者，将他们的理论带到了最终的逻辑问题。

translation.en: The cause of today is the effect of the past and the cause for the future.
translation.zh: 今天的起因是过去的结果，也是未来的起因。

translation.en: In the second place, I trust those that will not desert me in prosperity and adversity alike.
translation.zh: 其次，我相信那些在顺境和逆境中都不会抛弃我的人。

translation.zh: 我不能给你写最后一封信，对不起。但我已经期待你很久了。希望有人会来这封邮件。

translation.zh: 在他里面，那个——只在他里面，阿特曼——存在所有其他世界。所有其他谈话有什么用？只认识他。这是今生达到普遍性的桥梁。

translation.zh: 让你们的灵魂像一根“不间断的弦”一样日夜升天，来到心爱的人的脚下，他的宝座在你们自己的心中，让其余的人照顾好自己，那就是身体和其他一切。

translation.zh: 同样，心灵处于三种状态，其中一种是黑暗，称为 Tamas，存在于野蛮人和白痴中;它只会造成伤害。

translation.zh: 如果一个人一生中的每一个行为都是事先确定的，那么思想能力的文化还有什么必要——独立思想和行动自由发挥的领域在哪里？

translation.en: The tables have been turned, and the Hindu, who saw through tears of despair his ancient homestead covered with incendiary fire, ignited by unfriendly hands, now sees, when the searchlight of modern thought has dispersed the smoke, that his home is the one that is standing in all its strength, and all the rest have either vanished or are building their houses anew after the Hindu plan.
translation.zh: 桌子已经翻过来了，印度教徒在绝望的眼泪中看到了他古老的家园被燃烧的火焰覆盖，被不友好的手点燃，现在看到，当现代思想的探照灯驱散烟雾时，他的家是全力站立的家园，其余的要么消失了，要么正在按照印度教的计划重新建造房屋。

translation.zh: 关于感觉的知识，如声音等，被收集起来，供享受者（自我）享受;在感官知觉中聚集的知识的净化就是食物的净化（Ahara）。

translation.en: The man who goes to a temple is not considered thereby a better man than he who never goes.
translation.zh: 因此，去圣殿的人不被认为比从不去的人更好。

translation.en: At the same time there must be a supply of water at the place throughout the year, for drinking purposes and for everyday use.
translation.zh: 同时，该地点必须全年供应水，供饮用和日常使用。

translation.en: Shoes are not allowed to be worn, as they are made from the skin of an animal. The women pay even more attention to these details than the men. translation.zh: 不允许穿鞋，因为它们是由动物的皮制成的。女性比男性更注重这些细节。所有这些习俗都有其哲学。这才是真正的民主，是社会主义思想，是群众的发展，而不是个人的发展。

translation.en: Dost thou, O wise, seek for peace supreme here?
translation.zh: 智慧者啊，你在这里寻求至高无上的和平吗？

translation.en: Disciple: But, sir, if one or two desires remain, how can that state be called the absolute, transcendent Samadhi? For the scriptures say that in that state all the modifications of the mind and all desires are stamped out.
translation.zh: 弟子：可是，先生，如果还有一两个欲望，那又怎么能称为绝对的、超然的三摩地呢？因为经文说，在这种状态下，所有心灵的改变和所有的欲望都被消灭了。

translation.en: But let me draw your attention to one thing which unfortunately we always forget: that is — "O man, have faith in yourself."
translation.zh: 但是，请允许我提请你们注意一件我们总是忘记的事情：那就是——“人啊，要对自己有信心。

translation.en: I am so selfish again, always thinking of my own sufferings and paying no heed to others.
translation.zh: 我又变得如此自私，总是想着自己的痛苦，不理会别人。

translation.en: PS. Know it for certain that everything will be spoiled if delayed.
translation.zh: 可以肯定的是，如果延迟，一切都会被破坏。

translation.en: In this place there is no need for any person like Goodwin, as you can see.
translation.zh: 正如你所看到的，在这个地方不需要像古德温这样的人。

translation.en: On one side, the latter gain happiness, but on the other, they suffer misery too.
translation.zh: 一方面，后者获得了幸福，但另一方面，他们也遭受了痛苦。

translation.zh: 事实上，印度教徒是莫卧儿帝国的真正支柱;难道你不知道贾汉吉尔、沙贾汗和达拉·希科都是印度教母亲所生吗？

translation.en: I just wrote her a letter and duly posted it to her, care of Monroe & Co., 7 Rue Scribe, Paris.
translation.zh: 我刚刚给她写了一封信，并把它正式寄给了她，由巴黎7 Rue Scribe的Monroe & Co.照顾。

translation.zh: 所以我说，我宁愿希望在加尔各答有一些喧嚣和骚动，这样公众就可以倾向于相信罗摩克里希纳的使命;否则为了我而大惊小怪有什么用？

translation.en: I want to be off from the world for a time, if I can.
translation.zh: 如果可以的话，我想暂时离开这个世界。

translation.en: Harriet has scored a triumph really. I am charmed with Mr. Woolley — only hope Mary will be equally fortunate. It gives me a new lease of life to see people happy. May they all be happy.
translation.zh: 哈里特真的取得了胜利。我被伍利先生迷住了——只希望玛丽也能同样幸运。它给了我新的生命，看到人们快乐。愿他们都快乐。

translation.en: And if he was challenged to play dice, it was a point of honour to play, and dishonourable to decline the challenge.
translation.zh: 如果他被要求玩骰子，玩骰子是一种荣誉，拒绝挑战是不光彩的。

translation.en: It does not fall to the lot of all to feel for the misery of others.
translation.zh: 为他人的痛苦感到难过并不是所有人都应该做的。

translation.en: I am glad if you want to make christians in India by giving work and bread to the poor.
translation.zh: 如果你想通过给穷人工作和面包来使印度成为基督徒，我很高兴。

translation.en: We have been stifling that inner voice long enough, seeking to follow law and quiet the human nature, but there is that human instinct to rebel against nature's laws.
translation.zh: 我们扼杀内心的声音已经足够长了，试图遵循法律，让人性安静下来，但人类的本能是反抗自然的法则。

translation.en: At the beginning of this century it was almost feared that religion was at an end.
translation.zh: 在本世纪初，人们几乎担心宗教已经走到了尽头。

translation.zh: 关于作为讨论主题的心理问题，我在这里几乎无话可说，因为首先，问题是心理主体是否能够进行科学论证。

translation.en: My plan is to send out numbers of Hindu boys to every civilised country to preach — get men and women from foreign countries to work in India.
translation.zh: 我的计划是派出一定数量的印度教男孩到每个文明国家传教——让外国的男人和女人到印度工作。

translation.en: Others want to get to heaven, and they work for the same.
translation.zh: 其他人想上天堂，他们也为之努力。

translation.en: "To whom else shall worship be accorded, if not to such", was the answer.
translation.zh: “如果不是这样的人，还能敬拜谁”，这是答案。

translation.en: One of these is constantly differentiating, and the other is as constantly unifying; the one making more and more for separate individuals, the other, as it were, bringing the individuals into a mass, bringing out sameness in the midst of all this differentiation.
translation.zh: 其中一个是不断分化的，另一个是不断统一的;一个为独立的个体制造越来越多的东西，另一个，可以说，将个人带入一个群体，在所有这些差异中带来相同性。

translation.zh: 年轻学生的父母认为，如果后者与女性作斗争，那将是一个相当不利的缺点，以免她们变得女性化。

translation.en: In place of the word "Hindu" one has to say "Shiva".
translation.zh: 代替“印度教”这个词，人们必须说“湿婆”。

translation.en: And why did he not, with eyes closed, talk in a set drawl after the never-to-be-varied tone of the Indian flute-player, or talk in conventional language concealing his thoughts!
translation.zh: 为什么他不闭着眼睛，按照印度长笛演奏者永不变化的音调说话，或者用传统语言说话，隐藏他的思想！

translation.en: So with the words for God in every other language; their signification is very small.
translation.zh: 因此，在所有其他语言中对上帝的话语;它们的意义非常小。

translation.en: When we worship, we close our eyes and try to find God within.
translation.zh: 当我们敬拜时，我们闭上眼睛，试图在里面找到上帝。

translation.en: Even what you see as this world does not exist outside.
translation.zh: 甚至你所看到的这个世界也不存在在外面。

translation.en: Living in the midst of God — we must go and make images.
translation.zh: 生活在上帝中间——我们必须去创造形象。

translation.en: Thus we see, first, that the combination of time, space, and causation has neither existence nor non-existence.
translation.zh: 因此，我们看到，首先，时间、空间和因果关系的结合既不存在，也不存在。

translation.en: These few men with brains are the real leaders in everything and in every department of work; the majority are guided by them as with a string, and that is good, for everything goes all right when they follow in the footsteps of these leaders.
translation.zh: 这几个有头脑的人是所有事情和每个工作部门的真正领导者;大多数人都像一根绳子一样被他们引导，这很好，因为当他们追随这些领导人的脚步时，一切都会好起来的。

translation.en: Not by cogitation not by the force of logic, not by picking the brains of others and making a big book, as is the fashion in modern times, not even as I do, by taking up one of their writings and making a long lecture, but by patient investigation and discovery they found out the truth.
translation.zh: 不是靠揣摩，不是靠逻辑的力量，不是像现代的时尚那样，通过挑别人的脑袋写一本大书，甚至像我一样，拿起他们的一本著作，做一个长篇大论，而是通过耐心的调查和发现，他们发现了真相。

translation.en: To my mind this seems very hopeful, instead of that horrible idea of competition.
translation.zh: 在我看来，这似乎很有希望，而不是那种可怕的竞争想法。

translation.en: The more all differences and divisions disappear, the more you realise all as the one Divinity.
translation.zh: 所有的差异和分歧越是消失，你就越能意识到一切都是一体的神性。

translation.zh: 他还告诉我们一个年轻的工程师，一个受过教育的人，在一次灵性聚会上，“当胖威廉姆斯太太以他瘦弱的母亲的身份从屏风后面出现时，她惊呼道：'亲爱的母亲，你在灵界里成长得多么好！"

translation.en: I am surely coming this evening and of course will be very glad to meet the princess (probably Princess Demidoff) and her brother. But if it be too late to find my way out here, you will have to find me a place to sleep in the house.
translation.zh: 我今晚肯定会来，当然会很高兴见到公主（可能是德米多夫公主）和她的兄弟。但是，如果现在找不到我的出路为时已晚，你将不得不在房子里给我找个地方睡觉。

translation.en: I forgot to write — but if you can take the trouble to do it, please send through Sharat a bag of Mung, gram, and Arhar Dâl, also a little of the spice called Methi.
translation.zh: 我忘了写——但如果你能不厌其烦地写，请通过沙拉特寄一袋芒格、克和阿尔哈尔达尔，还有一点叫做梅蒂的香料。

translation.zh: 你准备好献出你的生命——为那个人献出你的生命了吗？

translation.zh: 这些是平房，最有艺术气息。唉！如今，这个名字被每个猪圈盗用这个名字所破坏。

translation.zh: 吠檀多对欧洲诗歌和哲学的影响非常大。

translation.zh: 他变得几乎是全能的，几乎是无所不知的。

translation.zh: 這裡有這樣一位老師，但老師沒有想過他是否應該受到尊重，他根本不知道自己是一個偉大的老師，他認為是媽媽在做所有事情，而不是他。

translation.zh: 晚餐时间，一百把刀的闪闪发光和一百把叉子的咔哒声吓坏了T兄弟（Turiyananda）。

translation.en: You must be able to sympathise fully with each particular, then at once to jump back to the highest monism. After having perfected yourself, you limit yourself voluntarily. translation.zh: 你必须能够完全同情每一个细节，然后立即跳回最高的一元论。在完善了自己之后，你自愿限制自己。将全部力量投入到每个动作中。能够暂时成为二元论者，忘记Advaita，但又能够随意地重新拿起它。

translation.en: "The seeking sinner meeteth the seeking Saviour."
translation.zh: “寻求的罪人与寻求的救主相遇。”

translation.zh: 我非常了解你提到的那位先生，你可以向他提供任何你喜欢的关于我的信息。

translation.zh: 他们说，即使是蛇的毒液也会因为坚决否认而失去力量。

translation.zh: 这是必须熄灭的赋予生命的水，物质主义的熊熊之火正在燃烧着其他国家数百万人的心灵。

translation.zh: “有时事情会突然降临到他们身上。例如，有一个男孩曾经和阿比达南达一起来读奥义书。有一天，他转过身来，问道：“先生，这一切真的是真的吗？

translation.zh: 自私的工作是奴隶的工作;这是一个测试。

translation.zh: 想要服侍父亲的人必须首先服侍孩子。

translation.zh: 到达现场后，我发现了一个很棒的大厅。

translation.zh: 勒克瑙市充满了 Mohurum 的庆祝活动。

translation.en: But the ancient Greeks, whom we call the Yavanas, and who were the first teachers of European civilisation, attained the zenith of their culture long before the Christians.
translation.zh: 但是古希腊人，我们称之为亚瓦那人，他们是欧洲文明的第一批教师，早在基督徒之前就达到了他们文化的顶峰。

translation.en: The mind will not receive new thoughts, because they bring discomfort.
translation.zh: 头脑不会接收新的想法，因为它们会带来不适。

translation.en: They think that God Almighty has given them a charter to rule over all the world, to advance His plans, to do anything they like, to turn the world upside down.
translation.zh: 他们认为全能的上帝给了他们一个宪章，让他们统治整个世界，推进他的计划，做任何他们喜欢的事情，把世界颠倒过来。

translation.en: "Come unto Me all ye that labour and are heavy laden and I will give you rest."
translation.zh: “凡劳苦担重担的人，都到我这里来，我就使你们得安息。”

translation.zh: 当然，如果你能宣布你的订婚，我会很高兴，我会履行我的诺言，在一封信中填写六份文件

translation.en: Have you ever seen jet-black, flat-nosed, thick-lipped, curly-haired Kaffirs with receding foreheads?
translation.zh: 你见过乌黑、扁鼻子、厚嘴唇、卷发、额头后退的卡菲尔吗？

translation.en: He moves onward discovering secret after secret of nature, searching out the secrets from her innermost heart, and what for?
translation.zh: 他继续探索大自然的一个又一个秘密，从她内心深处寻找秘密，而为了什么？

translation.en: Thus the Vedanta, whether we know it or not, has penetrated all the sects in India, and what we call Hinduism, this mighty banyan with its immense, almost infinite ramifications, has been throughout interpenetrated by the influence of the Vedanta.
translation.zh: 因此，无论我们是否知道，吠檀多已经渗透到印度的所有教派，而我们所说的印度教，这个强大的榕树，其巨大的、几乎无限的影响，一直渗透在吠檀多的影响下。

translation.en: Higher and nobler than all ordinary ones are another set of teachers, the Avatâras of Ishvara, in the world. They can transmit spirituality with a touch, even with a mere wish. The lowest and the most degraded characters become in one second saints at their command. They are the Teachers of all teachers, the highest manifestations of God through man. We cannot see God except through them. We cannot help worshipping them; and indeed they are the only ones whom we are bound to worship.
translation.zh: 比所有普通人更高尚的是世界上的另一组老师，即伊什瓦拉的阿瓦塔拉斯。他们可以通过触摸传递灵性，即使只是一个愿望。最低级和最堕落的角色在一秒钟内成为他们指挥的圣人。他们是所有教师的老师，是上帝通过人的最高体现。除非通过他们，否则我们无法看到上帝。我们不能不崇拜他们;事实上，他们是唯一我们必须崇拜的人。

translation.en: God is eternal; nature is eternal; so are all souls.
translation.zh: 上帝是永恒的;自然是永恒的;所有的灵魂也是如此。

translation.zh: 它表明，一个人可以拥有与金钱一样的精力和争取自由的斗争。

translation.zh: 但是，有一位来自印度的桑雅生被派往宗教议会，并且他取得了某种成功，这已经为锡兰的每个男人、女人和孩子所熟知。

translation.zh: 但这种运气被彻底打破了，再也没有回来。

translation.en: And when we reach even higher states of this love, all the little differences between the things of the world are entirely lost; man is seen no more as man, but only as God; the animal is seen no more as animal, but as God; even the tiger is no more a tiger, but a manifestation of God.
translation.zh: 当我们达到这种爱的更高境界时，世界上所有事物之间的微小差异都完全消失了;人不再被视为人，而只是被视为上帝;动物不再被视为动物，而是被视为上帝;甚至老虎也不再是老虎，而是上帝的显现。

translation.en: Love, Love — that's the one thing, the sole treasure.
translation.zh: 爱，爱——这是唯一的东西，唯一的宝藏。

translation.zh: 我本来打算在下周四（8月1日）启程前往芝加哥，但你的信阻止了我。这封信和包裹已经安全到达。

translation.zh: 本能发展为理性，理性发展为先验意识;因此，没有一个州与其他州相矛盾。

translation.en: Nowadays, it seems, the true art is reviving a little with the improvement in theatres; but, on.

translation.en: They do not try to conquer nature but to fit into nature, nothing else.
translation.zh: 他们不是试图征服自然，而是融入自然，没有别的。

translation.en: Now I shall quietly do Japa and meditation for some time — nothing more.
translation.zh: 现在，我将静静地做一段时间的Japa和冥想——仅此而已。

translation.en: Here you have a man than whom there is no more zealous a Hindu throughout the length and breadth of this land; here you have a prince than whom there is no prince in this land better informed in all affairs, both oriental and occidental, who takes from every nation whatever he can that is good.
translation.zh: 在这里，你有一个人，在这片土地的纵横交错中，没有比他更热心的印度教徒了;在这里，你有一位王子，在这片土地上，没有比他更了解东方和西方所有事务的王子了，他从每个国家拿走一切他能拿的东西。

translation.en: In the present age, it is to bring into coalition both these civilisations that Bhagavan Shri Ramakrishna was born.
translation.zh: 在当今时代，Bhagavan Shri Ramakrishna 诞生了，就是为了将这两种文明结合在一起。

translation.en: One sickly child of Bogesh suffers specially from want of care; the poor thing is rolling on the wooden deck the whole day.
translation.zh: 博格什的一个患病的孩子特别缺乏照顾;可怜的东西整天在木甲板上打滚。

translation.en: There is one thing which is very dissimilar between us and Christians, something which we never taught.
translation.zh: 我们和基督徒之间有一件事非常不同，我们从未教导过。

translation.en: It is a mistake to think that we are impure, that we are limited, that we are separate.
translation.zh: 认为我们是不纯洁的，我们是有限的，我们是分开的，这是错误的。

translation.en: The major portion of his address was an attack on the Christian religion.
translation.zh: 他讲话的主要部分是对基督教的攻击。

translation.en: I had to cut the net which I had thrown round myself, and the power to do this is within.
translation.zh: 我必须剪断我自己撒下的网，而这样做的力量就在里面。

translation.en: Duty becomes a disease with us; it drags us ever forward.
translation.zh: 责任成为我们的疾病;它拖着我们不断前进。

translation.en: Often and often, we see that the very best of men even are troubled and visited with tribulations in this world; it may be inexplicable; but it is also the experience of my life that the heart and core of everything here is good, that whatever may be the surface waves, deep down and underlying everything, there is an infinite basis of goodness and love; and so long as we do not reach that basis, we are troubled; but having once reached that zone of calmness, let winds howl and tempests rage.
translation.zh: 我们经常看到，最优秀的人甚至在这个世界上受到困扰和磨难;它可能是莫名其妙的;但这也是我一生的经验，这里一切事物的核心和核心都是善的，无论表面的波浪是什么，在一切的深处和背后，都有无限的善良和爱的基础;只要我们没有达到这个基础，我们就会陷入困境;但是一旦到达了那个平静的区域，就让风呼啸，让暴风雨肆虐。

translation.en: This mind, so deluded, so weak, so easily led, even this mind can be strong and may catch a glimpse of that knowledge, that Oneness, which saves us from dying again and again.

translation.en: As to their influence, apart from the Shrauta and Smârta rituals, all the forms of the rituals in vogue from the Himalayas to the Comorin have been taken from the Tantras, and they direct the worship of the Shâkta, or Shaiva, or Vaishnava, and all the others alike.

translation.en: They spend the time quarrelling and determining what they should get hold of, and do not get hold of anything.

translation.en: It seems as if during that period the national life had this one end in view, viz how to make us weaker and weaker till we have become real earthworms, crawling at the feet of every one who dares to put his foot on us.

translation.en: Both the goal and the methods employed for reaching it are called Yoga, a word derived from the same Sanskrit root as the English "yoke", meaning "to join", to join us to our reality, God. There are various such Yogas, or methods of union — but the chief ones are — Karma-Yoga, Bhakti-Yoga, Râja-Yoga, and Jnâna-Yoga.
translation.zh: 达到目标和所采用的方法都被称为瑜伽，这个词与英语“yoke”源自同一个梵语词根，意思是“加入”，将我们加入我们的现实，上帝。有各种各样的瑜伽或结合方法——但主要的是——业力瑜伽、巴克提瑜伽、拉贾瑜伽和 Jnâna-瑜伽。

translation.en: These and nothing but these are our scriptures.

translation.en: Learning has no place in religion; for the majority learning is a block in the way. . . . A man my have read all the libraries in the world and many not be religious at all, and another, who cannot perhaps write his own name, senses religion and realises it. The whole of religion is our own inner perception. When I use the words "man-making religion", I do not mean books, nor dogmas, nor theories. I mean the man who has realised, has fully perceived, something of that infinite presence in his own heart.
translation.zh: 学习在宗教中没有立足之地;对于大多数人来说，学习是路上的一个障碍。一个人读过世界上所有的图书馆，许多图书馆根本没有宗教信仰，而另一个人，也许不会写自己的名字，他感觉到宗教并意识到了这一点。整个宗教都是我们自己内在的感知。当我使用“造人的宗教”这个词时，我指的不是书本，也不是教条，也不是理论。我的意思是，这个人已经意识到，已经完全感知到，在他自己的心中，有某种无限的存在。

translation.en: PS. The present Hindu society is organised only for spiritual men, and hopelessly crushes out everybody else. Why? Where shall they go who want to enjoy the world a little with its frivolities? Just as our religion takes in all, so should our society. translation.en: We find that man, as it were, is always surrounded by something greater than himself, and he is trying to grasp the meaning of this. Man will ever [seek] the highest ideal. translation.zh: 我们发现，人总是被比他自己更伟大的东西所包围，他试图理解它的意义。人类将永远[寻求]最高的理想。他知道它的存在，宗教是对最高理想的追求。起初，他所有的探索都是在外在的层面上——放在天上，放在不同的地方——只是根据[他对人的整体本质的把握]。

translation.zh: 毕竟，除了通过桑雅萨之外，没有其他方法可以了解自我。

translation.en: Tell your body that it is strong, tell your mind that it is strong, and have unbounded faith and hope in yourself.
translation.zh: 告诉你的身体它是坚强的，告诉你的头脑它是坚强的，对自己有无限的信心和希望。

translation.en: A lioness in search of prey came upon a flock of sheep, and as she jumped at one of them, she gave birth to a cub and died on the spot.
translation.zh: 一只寻找猎物的母狮遇到了一群羊，当她跳到其中一只羊身上时，她生下了一只幼崽，当场死亡。

translation.en: The Swami said that dwelling on the Vedas he even seemed to hear the laughter of the gods.
translation.zh: 斯瓦米说，住在吠陀经上，他甚至似乎听到了众神的笑声。

translation.en: In India, you cannot, on account of your wealth, power, or any other merit, leave your fellows behind and make common cause with your superiors; you cannot deprive those who helped in your acquiring the excellence of any benefit therefrom and give them in return only contempt. If you want to rise to a higher caste in India, you have to elevate all your caste first, and then there is nothing in your onward path to hold you back.
translation.zh: 在印度，你不能因为你的财富、权力或任何其他优点而抛弃你的同胞，与你的上司共同奋斗;你不能剥夺那些帮助你获得卓越的人从中获得任何好处，而只给予他们蔑视作为回报。如果你想在印度上升到更高的种姓，你必须首先提升你所有的种姓，然后你前进的道路上没有什么可以阻止你。

translation.en: Do you think, so long as one Jiva endures in bondage, you will have any liberation?
translation.zh: 你认为，只要一个吉瓦在束缚中忍受，你就会有任何解脱吗？

translation.en: We cannot live satisfied where we are; that is the natural growth of the human soul.
translation.zh: 我们不能满足于现状;那是人类灵魂的自然成长。

translation.en: I have nothing more to say; all love and gratitude is yours; already you know that. You have already done more than I ever deserved. I don't know whether I go to Paris or not, but I must go to England sure in May. I must not go home without trying England a few weeks more. With all love,
translation.zh: 我无话可说;所有的爱和感激都是你的;你已经知道了。你已经做了比我应得的更多的事。我不知道我是否要去巴黎，但我必须在五月去英国。我一定不能不再尝试几个星期的英格兰。带着所有的爱，

translation.en: If a plague comes, it is I; if a tiger comes, it is I.
translation.zh: 如果瘟疫来了，那就是我;如果老虎来了，那就是我。

translation.en: The old Sanskrit word Yoga is defined as [Chittavrittinirodha]. It means that Yoga is the science that teaches us to bring the Chitta under control from the state of change. The Chitta is the stuff from which our minds are made and which is being constantly churned into waves by external and internal influences. Yoga teaches us how to control the mind so that it is not thrown out of balance into wave forms. . . .
translation.zh: 古老的梵语单词瑜伽被定义为[Chittavrittinirodha]。这意味着瑜伽是一门科学，它教我们从变化的状态中控制 Chitta。Chitta 是构成我们思想的东西，它不断被外部和内部影响搅动成波浪。瑜伽教我们如何控制心灵，使它不会失去平衡，变成波浪形。

translation.en: He is the Life of our lives, the hearing of our ears, the sight of our eyes.
translation.zh: 他是我们生命的生命，是我们耳朵的听觉，我们眼睛的视觉。

translation.en: Madura, the seat of ancient learning, Madura the favoured city of the God Sundareshwara, the holy Dwadashântakshetram of Yogis, lags behind no other Indian city in its warm admiration of your exposition of Indian Philosophy and in its grateful acknowledgments of your priceless services for humanity.
translation.zh: 马都拉是古代学问的所在地，马都拉是Sundareshwara神的青睐之城，是瑜伽士的圣地Dwadashântakshetram，在热烈钦佩你对印度哲学的阐述和对你对人类的无价服务的感激之情中，它落后于其他印度城市。

translation.en: I did not denounce the Mother-worship of the Tantras, or even the real Vamachara.
translation.zh: 我没有谴责密宗的母亲崇拜，甚至没有谴责真正的Vamachara。

translation.en: We see this result illustrated in the growing revolt against old traditions and authorities.
translation.zh: 我们看到这一结果体现在对旧传统和权威的日益增长的反抗中。

translation.en: If a man goes with an impure mind into a temple, he adds to the sins that he had already, and goes home a worse man than when he left it.
translation.zh: 如果一个人带着不洁的心进入圣殿，他就会加重他已经犯下的罪孽，回家时会比离开圣殿时更糟糕。

translation.en: On the other hand, the argument of the ancient Buddhists seems to be stronger — that we do not know, and cannot know, anything that is beyond the bunch of qualities. According to them, the soul consists of a bundle of qualities called sensations and feelings. A mass of such is what is called the soul, and this mass is continually changing.
translation.zh: 另一方面，古代佛教徒的论点似乎更有力——我们不知道，也不可能知道任何超越这些品质的东西。根据他们的说法，灵魂由一系列称为感觉和感觉的品质组成。这样的质量就是所谓的灵魂，这个质量在不断变化。

translation.en: After the day's work, the peasants sit under a tree and discuss these questions.
translation.zh: 一天的工作结束后，农民们坐在一棵树下讨论这些问题。

translation.en: It is diabolical to say that all animals are created for men to be killed and used in any way man likes.
translation.zh: 说所有的动物都是为人类创造的，以人类喜欢的任何方式被杀死和使用，这是恶魔般的。

translation.en: From time immemorial Indians have seen the mightiest royal power tremble before the frown of the ascetic priest, devoid of worldly desire, armed with spiritual strength — the power of Mantras (sacred formulas) and religious lore — and the weapon of curses.
translation.zh: 自古以来，印度人就看到最强大的王权在苦行僧的皱眉面前颤抖，他们没有世俗的欲望，拥有精神力量——咒语（神圣公式）和宗教传说的力量——以及诅咒的武器。

translation.en: One man says there is a great Being sitting above the clouds and governing the whole universe, and he asks me to believe that solely on the authority of his assertion.
translation.zh: 有一个人说，有一个伟大的存在坐在云层之上，统治着整个宇宙，他要求我完全相信他的断言的权威。

translation.en: What is Balaram Babu [Balaram Bose] doing?
translation.zh: Balaram Babu [Balaram Bose] 在做什么？

translation.en: Jnana is taught very clearly by Krishna in the Bhagavad-Gitâ.
translation.zh: 克里希纳在《薄伽梵歌》中非常清楚地教导了 Jnana。

translation.en: "Pure? She is chastity itself", says Rama.
translation.zh: “纯洁？她本身就是贞操“，拉玛说。

translation.en: According to these theologians, you and I — most of us — probably have been some of these gods several times.
translation.zh: 根据这些神学家的说法，你和我——我们大多数人——可能已经多次成为这些神中的一些。

translation.en: There he was, brave Nachiketa waiting at the house of Death for three days, and you know how he obtained what he desired.
translation.zh: 他在那里，勇敢的Nachiketa在死亡之家等了三天，你知道他是如何得到他想要的东西的。

translation.en: We shall take it for granted that there are many selves, and each self is pure and perfect; various kinds of gross and fine matter superimpose themselves on the self and make it multicoloured.
translation.zh: 我们理所当然地认为，有许多自我，每个自我都是纯洁和完美的;各种粗细的物质叠加在自我上，使它变得五彩缤纷。

translation.en: Now these two mighty powers are friendly to each other; but neither is there any more that glorious Kshatra (warlike) velour of the kings, nor that spiritual brilliance which characterised the Brahmins; each has lost his former intrinsic strength.
translation.zh: 现在这两个强大的力量彼此友好;但不再有国王那种光荣的 Kshatra（好战的）天鹅绒，也没有婆罗门特有的那种精神光辉;每个人都失去了他以前的内在力量。

translation.en: But she stopped all of a sudden and vehemently asserted that she was not going to speak any further, as she has been obstructed by a certain male animal in the audience in her speech.
translation.zh: 但她突然停了下来，并强烈地断言她不会再说话了，因为她在演讲中被听众中的某只雄性动物阻挠了。

translation.en: The eyes and ears are only the instruments of seeing and hearing, and the organs are inside.
translation.zh: 眼睛和耳朵只是视觉和听觉的工具，器官在里面。

translation.en: This is the reason why I am explaining these things: First, because in all religions everything degenerates upon being practiced by [the ignorant]. The camphor in the bottle evaporated, and they are fighting over the bottle.
translation.zh: 這就是為什麼我要解釋這些事情的原因：首先，因為在所有宗教中，一切都在被〔無知的人〕實踐時就會退化。瓶子里的樟脑蒸发了，他们正在争夺瓶子。

translation.en: We all concentrate our minds upon those things we love.
translation.zh: 我们都把心思集中在我们喜欢的那些事情上。

translation.en: We shall see how they took, as it were, this old idea of God, the Governor of the universe, who is external to the universe, and first put Him inside the universe.
translation.zh: 我们将看到他们如何接受上帝的古老观念，即宇宙的统治者，他是宇宙之外的，并首先将他置于宇宙内部。

translation.en: "A lame one-legged universe makes only a lame one-legged God."
translation.zh: “一个跛脚的独腿宇宙只会造就一个跛脚的独腿上帝。”

translation.en: When this world goes, good and evil go with it; but when we can transcend this world, we get rid of both good and evil and have bliss.
translation.zh: 当这个世界消失时，善恶也随之而去;但是当我们能够超越这个世界时，我们就会摆脱善恶，获得幸福。

translation.en: All the bodies in the universe are made up of Tanmâtras, their difference lies in the arrangement of the latter.
translation.zh: 宇宙中的所有天体都是由Tanmâtras组成的，它们的区别在于后者的排列。

translation.en: If a man or a woman were allowed the freedom to take up any woman or man as wife or husband, if individual pleasure, satisfaction of animal instincts, were to be allowed to run loose in society, the result must be evil, evil children, wicked and demoniacal.
translation.zh: 如果允许一个男人或女人自由地娶任何一个女人或男人为妻或丈夫，如果允许个人的快乐，动物本能的满足，在社会中肆无忌惮，结果一定是邪恶的，邪恶的孩子，邪恶的和恶魔。

translation.en: — "It is those foolish people who identify themselves with their bodies, that piteously cry, 'We are weak, we are low.' All this is atheism. Now that we have attained the state beyond fear, we shall have no more fear and become heroes. This indeed is theism which we, the servants of Shri Ramakrishna, will choose.
translation.zh: ——“正是那些愚蠢的人用自己的身体来认同自己，可怜地哭泣，'我们是软弱的，我们是卑微的。这一切都是无神论。现在我们已经达到了无所畏惧的境界，我们将不再害怕并成为英雄。这确实是我们罗摩克里希纳的仆人会选择的有神论。

translation.en: One possessing Vairagya does not understand by Atman the individual ego but the All-pervading Lord, residing as the Self and Internal Ruler in all.
translation.zh: 一个拥有Vairagya的人不理解阿特曼的个人自我，而是无所不在的主，作为自我和内在的统治者居住在所有人中。

translation.en: All the princes of the neighbourhood put on their bravest attire and presented themselves before her.
translation.zh: 附近的所有王子都穿上了他们最勇敢的服装，出现在她面前。

translation.en: I want, before going into the subject of the day, to speak a few bold words to you all.
translation.zh: 在进入今天的主题之前，我想对大家说几句大胆的话。

translation.en: You will feel neither pleasure nor pain.
translation.zh: 你既不会感到快乐，也不会感到痛苦。

translation.en: In spite of concessions and compromises, Buddhism was eminently successful and remained the national religion of India.
translation.zh: 尽管有让步和妥协，佛教还是取得了巨大的成功，仍然是印度的国教。

translation.en: Therein lies their heroism, that they are ready to face death as a brother, because they are convinced that there is no death for them.
translation.zh: 这就是他们的英雄主义，他们准备像兄弟一样面对死亡，因为他们确信他们没有死亡。

translation.en: He had taken two pebbles into his hand and was saying how, when he was well, his mind might direct itself to this and that, or his will might seem less firm; but let the least touch of pain or illness come, let him look death in the face for a while, and "I am as hard as that (knocking the stones together), for I have touched the feet of God".
translation.zh: 他手里拿着两颗鹅卵石，心里说着，等他好了，他的思想会怎样地把自己引向这个和那个，或者他的意志可能看起来不那么坚定了;但让最轻微的痛苦或疾病来临，让他在死亡面前看一会儿，“我像那样坚硬（敲石头），因为我触摸了上帝的脚”。

translation.en: Paris is the first teacher of the founding of colonial empires.
translation.zh: 巴黎是建立殖民帝国的第一位老师。

translation.en: The philosophy of the age is Advaitism, everybody talks of it; only in Europe, they try to be original.
translation.zh: 这个时代的哲学是Advaitism，每个人都在谈论它;只有在欧洲，他们才试图做到原创。

translation.en: If you burn your finger in it, you are a fool.
translation.zh: 如果你在里面烧伤你的手指，你就是个傻瓜。

translation.en: Why has the white complexion of our forefathers now become black?
translation.zh: 为什么我们祖先的白肤色现在变成了黑色？

translation.en: Being alone with Swamiji in the boat, the disciple had an opportunity of asking him freely about all subjects.
translation.zh: 与斯瓦米吉单独在船上，门徒有机会自由地向他询问所有主题。

translation.en: We may not resist an evil, but at the same time we may feel very miserable.
translation.zh: 我们可能无法抗拒邪恶，但同时我们可能会感到非常痛苦。

translation.en: A halo of equal sacredness shines around the queen, so she is scrupulously guarded from the gaze of the common folk, not even the sun may cast a glance on her beauty!
translation.zh: 女王周围闪耀着同样神圣的光环，因此她受到平民百姓的目光的严格保护，甚至连太阳都无法瞥见她的美丽！

translation.en: (Delivered at the Shakespeare Club of Pasadena, California, on January 27, 1900 )
translation.zh: （1900年1月27日在加利福尼亚州帕萨迪纳的莎士比亚俱乐部发表）

translation.en: Mrs. Bull of Boston and Miss MacLeod of New York are now in India.
translation.zh: 波士顿的布尔夫人和纽约的麦克劳德小姐现在在印度。

translation.en: Disciple: Sir, I have associated with the Sannyasin and householder disciples of Shri Ramakrishna for so many years; I have heard from them that they are all devotees of Shri Ramakrishna.
translation.zh: 弟子：先生，我与罗摩克里希纳的桑雅生和家主弟子交往了这么多年;我从他们那里听说，他们都是罗摩克里希纳的奉献者。

translation.en: Never vaunt of your gifts to the poor or expect their gratitude, but rather be grateful to them for giving you the occasion of practicing charity to them.
translation.zh: 永远不要吹嘘你对穷人的礼物或期望他们的感激之情，而是要感谢他们给了你向他们施行慈善的机会。

translation.en: Just as in one life we have so many various phases of expression, the protoplasm developing into the baby, the child, the young man, the old man, so, from that protoplasm up to the most perfect man we get one continuous life, one chain.
translation.zh: 就像在一个生命中，我们有许多不同的表达阶段，原生质发展成婴儿、孩子、年轻人、老人，所以，从原生质到最完美的人，我们得到一个连续的生命，一条链。

translation.zh: 没有这个，祖国才会真正受益于你现在的哭泣，“我们不会碰你！

translation.en: For one who has not that egoistic idea, the best course is to forbear.
translation.zh: 对于一个没有利己主义想法的人来说，最好的办法就是忍耐。

translation.en: That is exactly what the Vedantist says of Atman.
translation.zh: 这正是吠陀主义者对阿特曼的评价。

translation.zh: 他们现在脑子里想着不让我穿过他们的街道，所以当我经过时，他们嚎叫着，尖叫着，紧紧抓住我的脚。

translation.en: The highest kind of men silently collect true and noble ideas, and others — the Buddhas and Christs — go from place to place preaching them and working for them.
translation.zh: 最崇高的人默默地收集真实和高尚的思想，而其他人——佛陀和基督——则从一个地方到另一个地方宣讲它们并为它们工作。

translation.en: Various are our faces; I see no two alike, yet we are all human beings.
translation.zh: 我们的面孔各不相同;我看不出两个是一样的，但我们都是人。

translation.en: 106. On Western and Eastern views of a person as a body or a soul:
translation.zh: 106. 关于西方和东方对人作为身体或灵魂的看法：

translation.en: The guiding motive of mankind should be charity towards men, charity towards all animals.
translation.zh: 人类的指导动机应该是对人类的仁爱，对所有动物的仁爱。

translation.en: It is said that he was asked in Detroit if the Hindoos throw their children into the river.
translation.zh: 据说在底特律有人问他，印度教徒是否把他们的孩子扔进了河里。

translation.en: So it might be quite probable that during the period of Buddhistic ascendancy, the rich Hindus, in imitation of the Buddhists, used to erect something as a memorial resembling their Skambha, and the poor in a similar manner copied them on a reduced scale, and afterwards the miniature memorials of the poor Hindus became a new addition to the Skambha.
translation.zh: 因此，很有可能在佛教盛行的时期，富有的印度教徒模仿佛教徒，曾经竖立一些类似于他们的 Skamba 的东西作为纪念碑，而穷人以类似的方式以缩小规模复制它们，后来贫穷的印度教徒的微型纪念碑成为 Skamba 的新成员。

translation.en: The greatest force is derived from the power of thought. The finer the element, the more powerful it is . The silent power of thought influences people even at a distance, because mind is one as well as many. The universe is a cobweb; minds are spiders.
translation.zh: 最大的力量来自思想的力量。元素越细，它就越强大。思想的无声力量甚至在远处也能影响人们，因为思想既是一，也是多。宇宙是一张蜘蛛网;头脑是蜘蛛。

translation.zh: “在文学方面，我们的史诗、诗歌和戏剧的地位与任何语言一样高;我们的“Shaguntala”（Shakuntala）被德国最伟大的诗人总结为“天地合一”。

translation.zh: 其次，如果没有一些抽象的概念作为背景，就不可能对事实进行分组或概括。

translation.zh: 那一刻，奉献者在他面前挥舞着香，但甘塔卡纳的偏执是如此之大，以至于当他看到香的香味进入毗湿奴的鼻孔时，他将手指伸进去，以防止神享受甜美的气味。

translation.zh: 头脑清醒的人对他们迷信的宗教感到厌恶，并期待着印度的新光明。

translation.zh: 请寄出萨拉达南达的信件，这些信件已交给您照顾。

translation.zh: 感谢上帝，我一生的经历教会了我，我总是热切地找到我想要的东西。有时是在很多痛苦之后，但这并不重要！一切都在奖励的柔软中被遗忘了。我的朋友，你也正在经历麻烦，但你会得到你的奖赏。唉！你现在发现的不是奖赏，而是额外的痛苦。

translation.zh: 这个婆罗门，神的人，认识婆罗门的人，理想的人，完美的人，必须留下来;他一定不能去。

translation.en: The reason being that good and evil are not two things but one, the difference being only in manifestation — one of degree, not kind.
translation.zh: 原因是善与恶不是两件事，而是一回事，区别只在于表现形式——一种程度，而不是种类。

translation.en: Philosophy of course is the essence of every religion; mythology explains and illustrates it by means of the more or less legendary lives of great men, stories and fables of wonderful things, and so on; ritual gives to that philosophy a still more concrete form, so that every one may grasp it — ritual is in fact concretised philosophy.
translation.zh: 哲学当然是每个宗教的本质;神话通过伟人或多或少的传奇生活、奇妙事物的故事和寓言等来解释和说明它;儀式賦予這種哲學以更具體的形式，使每個人都能掌握它——儀式實際上是具體化的哲學。

translation.en: It was opened in great form with music and ceremony and speeches; then the delegates were introduced one by one, and they stepped up and spoke.
translation.zh: 它以音乐、仪式和演讲的形式开幕;然后代表们一个接一个地被介绍，他们走上前来发言。

translation.en: Always discriminate between the real and the unreal, and devote yourself heart and soul to the attempt to realise the Atman.
translation.zh: 始终区分真实与虚幻，全心全意地致力于实现阿特曼的尝试。

translation.en: When the soul realises that it depends on nothing in the universe, from gods to the lowest atom, that is called Kaivalya (isolation) and perfection. It is attained when this mixture of purity and impurity called Sattva (intellect) has been made as pure as the Purusha itself; then the Sattva reflects only the unqualified essence of purity, which is the Purusha.
translation.zh: 當靈魂意識到它依賴於宇宙中沒有任何東西，從神到最低級的原子，這被稱為Kaivalya（孤立）和完美。当这种被称为 Sattva（智力）的纯洁和不纯洁的混合物变得像 Purusha 本身一样纯洁时，它就达到了;那么 Sattva 只反映了不合格的纯洁本质，即 Purusha。

translation.en: You should also try to produce something original like this.
translation.zh: 你也应该尝试制作这样原创的东西。

translation.en: I had a beautiful letter from Mr. Flagg. [181] I am soon coming to N.Y. where I hope to see you.
translation.zh: 我收到了弗拉格先生的一封漂亮的信。[181] 我很快就要来纽约了，希望能见到你。

translation.en: These three would; not make the mind Nirvikalpa, changeless, but would leave the seeds for getting bodies again.
translation.zh: 这三个人会;不会使心灵涅槃，不变，但会留下再次获得身体的种子。

translation.en: You have one thing great, your neighbour has another thing great.
translation.zh: 你有一件很棒的事情，你的邻居有另一件很棒的事情。

translation.en: All blessings follow you. Never mind my harshness. You know the heart always, whatever the lips say. All blessings on you. For the last year or so I have not been in my senses at all. I do not know why. I had to pass through this hell — and I have. I am much better — well, in fact. Lord help you all. I am going to the Himalayas soon to retire for ever. My work is done.
translation.zh: 所有的祝福都跟着你。别介意我的严厉。无论嘴唇说什么，你总是知道心。所有的祝福都归于你。在过去一年左右的时间里，我根本没有理智。我不知道为什么。我必须经历这个地狱——我做到了。事实上，我好多了。主啊，帮助你们所有人。我很快就要去喜马拉雅山永远退休了。我的工作完成了。

translation.en: Whatever difference of opinion followers of other creeds may have with him, few will venture to deny that the Swami has done yeoman's service to his country in opening the eyes of the Western world to "the good in the Hindu".
translation.zh: 无论其他信条的追随者与他有什么不同意见，很少有人敢于否认斯瓦米为他的国家做出了贡献，让西方世界看到了“印度教的善良”。

translation.en: How changed you are since I saw you last!"
translation.zh: 自从我上次见到你以来，你的变化有多大！

translation.en: There is no harm in it either, except that happiness and unhappiness are both infectious.
translation.zh: 它也没有什么坏处，只是快乐和不快乐都是会传染的。

translation.en: And the more the mind becomes introspective, the more that idea of difference vanishes.
translation.zh: 头脑越是内省，差异的观念就越消失。

translation.en: They said to the people that the race must always grow.
translation.zh: 他们对人们说，种族必须永远成长。

translation.en: We want to lead mankind to the place where there is neither the Vedas, nor the Bible, nor the Koran; yet this has to be done by harmonising the Vedas, the Bible and the Koran.
translation.zh: 我们想把人类带到一个既没有吠陀经、圣经也没有古兰经的地方;然而，这必须通过协调吠陀经、圣经和古兰经来实现。

translation.en: But with the Aryans the idea was from the first that the soul is not the body, but would live on. There are some old hymns in the Rig-Veda: when the bodies are burnt they say, "Take him gently, purify him, give him a bright body, take him to the land where the fathers live — wherethere is no more sorrow and where thereis joy forever". [312]
translation.zh: 但对于雅利安人来说，从一开始就认为灵魂不是身体，而是会继续存在。梨俱吠陀中有一些古老的赞美诗：当尸体被烧毁时，他们说：“温柔地带走他，净化他，给他一个光明的身体，带他到父亲居住的土地——那里不再有悲伤，那里有永远的欢乐”。[312]

translation.en: When our carriage stopped at its destination, three or four gentlemen greeted Swamiji and showed him up to the first door.
translation.zh: 当我们的马车停在目的地时，三四位绅士向斯瓦米吉打招呼，并把他带到第一扇门。

translation.en: If the organs are destroyed by any means, even if the eyes or the ears be there, we shall not see or hear.
translation.zh: 如果器官被以任何方式破坏，即使眼睛或耳朵在那里，我们也不会看到或听到。

translation.en: After carefully scrutinising all sides of the question and setting aside all fanaticism that is rampant on this delicate question of food, I must say that my conviction tends to confirm this view — that the Hindus are, after all right; I mean that injunction of the Hindu Shastras which lays down the rule that food, like many other things, must be different according to the difference of birth and profession; this is the sound conclusion.
translation.zh: 在仔细研究了这个问题的所有方面，并抛开了在这个微妙的食物问题上猖獗的所有狂热之后，我必须说，我的信念倾向于证实这一观点——印度教徒毕竟是好的;我的意思是印度教 Shastras 的禁令，它规定了食物和许多其他事物一样，必须根据出生和职业的差异而有所不同;这是一个合理的结论。

translation.en: Hitherto it has not been possible to preach this Noble Truth entirely free from the settings of dualistic weakness; this alone, we are convinced, explains why it has not been more operative and useful to mankind at large.
translation.zh: 迄今为止，不可能完全摆脱二元论软弱的背景来宣讲这一圣谛;我们深信，仅凭这一点，就解释了为什么它对整个人类没有更有效和更有用。

translation.en: Man is not wicked by his own nature — not at all.
translation.zh: 人本身的本性并不邪恶——一点也不邪恶。

translation.en: I do not know whether I will come to Annisquam or not. The letters need not be sent over to me until I write you again. She has been very kind to me.
translation.zh: 我不知道我是否会来安尼斯夸姆。在我再次给你写信之前，这些信不需要寄给我。巴格利夫人似乎对波士顿报纸上那篇针对我的文章感到不安。[108]她从底特律寄给我一份副本，并停止了与我的通信。愿主保佑她。她对我很好。

translation.en: It may be urged that my business is only in eating and assimilating the food, and that strengthening the body by the food is done for me by somebody else.
translation.zh: 也许有人会劝说，我的工作只是吃和吸收食物，而通过食物来增强身体是别人为我做的。

translation.en: The old idea of the fatherhood of God is connected with the sweet notion of God presiding over happiness. We want to deny facts. Evil is non-existent, is zero. The "I" is evil. And the "I" exists only too much. Am I zero? Every day I try to find myself so and fail.
translation.zh: 上帝的父亲身份的旧观念与上帝主宰幸福的甜蜜观念有关。我们想否认事实。邪恶是不存在的，是零。“我”是邪恶的。而“我”存在得太多了。我是零吗？每天我都试图发现自己如此，但失败了。

translation.en: My brother-disciple Saradananda will send Rs. 50/- from Lahore to Karachi. Don't yield to sorrow — everything is in God's hands. Certainly I won't go anywhere this year without meeting all of you. My blessings to all.
translation.zh: 我的兄弟弟子萨拉达南达（Saradananda）将从拉合尔寄出50卢比到卡拉奇。不要屈服于悲伤——一切都在上帝的手中。当然，如果不见到你们所有人，我今年哪儿都不会去。我祝福所有人。

translation.en: Secondly, owing to my kidney troubles I cannot count upon a long life.
translation.zh: 其次，由于我的肾脏问题，我不能指望长寿。

translation.en: The bold, brave and steady Englishman, if I may use the expression, with his skull a little thicker than those of other people — if he has once an idea put into his brain, it never comes out; and the immense practicality and energy of the race makes it sprout up and immediately bear fruit.
translation.zh: 大胆、勇敢和稳重的英国人，如果我可以用这个表达方式的话，他的头骨比其他人的头骨厚一点——如果他曾经把一个想法放在他的大脑里，它就永远不会出来;而比赛的巨大实用性和能量使它萌芽并立即结出果实。

translation.zh: 如果这种情况停止，通常身体中的所有其他力量表现将立即停止。

translation.en: The idea of psychology in the West is very much degraded. Psychology is the science of sciences; but in the West it is placed upon the same plane as all other sciences; that is, it is judged by the same criterion — utility.
translation.zh: 西方的心理学思想非常退化。心理学是科学的科学;但在西方，它与所有其他科学处于同一平面;也就是说，它是根据相同的标准来判断的——效用。

translation.zh: 但尽管如此，吠陀经的因果报应几乎从印度消失了。

translation.zh: 在寺庙内，会有一个坐在天鹅上的罗摩克里希纳的身影。

translation.en: In some It is expressed more, in others less, but this difference of expression has no effect upon the Atman.
translation.zh: 在一些中，它表达得更多，在另一些中表达得更少，但这种表达的差异对阿特曼没有影响。

translation.en: There are others who advance the theory that the root of all religions was the tribal assimilation of gods into one.
translation.zh: 还有一些人提出这样的理论，即所有宗教的根源都是将众神同化为一体的部落。

translation.en: There are various sects and doctrines in India, said Vivekananda, some of which accept the theory of a personal God, and others which believe that God and the universe are one; but whatever sect the Hindoo belongs to he does not say that his is the only right belief, and that all others must be wrong.
translation.zh: 维韦卡南达说，印度有各种各样的教派和教义，其中一些接受人格上帝的理论，而另一些则相信上帝和宇宙是一体的;但无论印度教属于哪个教派，他都不会说他是唯一正确的信仰，而所有其他信仰都一定是错的。

translation.en: I send you forthwith a translation of the Nâsadiya Hymn sent by Dr. Bose through you. I have tried to make it as literal as possible.
translation.zh: 我马上把博斯博士通过你寄来的《纳萨迪亚赞美诗》的译本寄给你。我试图让它尽可能地字面意思。

translation.en: It is a sign of weakness that we have to go on crawling like worms to get a few facts and build generalisations, and then the whole thing tumbles down again.
translation.zh: 这是软弱的表现，我们必须像蠕虫一样继续爬行，以获得一些事实并建立概括，然后整个事情再次倒塌。

translation.en: Like us, their negotiations for marriage are carried on by their parents.
translation.zh: 像我们一样，他们的婚姻谈判是由他们的父母进行的。

translation.en: That Sanyal is feeling miserable is because his mind is not yet pure like the water of the Ganga.
translation.zh: 桑亚尔感到痛苦是因为他的心还没有像恒河的水那样纯净。

translation.en: "He who has given up all desires, he alone is happy."
translation.zh: “放弃一切欲望的人，只有他才是快乐的。”

translation.en: To bring Master Mahashay to Kashmir is still a far cry, for it will be long before a college is established here.
translation.zh: 将马哈沙伊大师带到克什米尔仍然遥不可及，因为在这里建立一所大学还需要很长时间。

translation.zh: 我走在街上，以为上帝在每个人里面，一个强壮的人走过来，推了我一把，我倒在人行道上。

translation.zh: 主是唯一的给予者，世上所有的人都只是店主。拿到他的支票，它必须到处兑现。

translation.en: We shall only be successful in grappling with the waves when we can get hold of them in their fine causes, and until you can get hold of them, and subdue them before they become gross, there is no hope of conquering any passion perfectly.
translation.zh: 只有当我们能抓住海浪的美好事业时，我们才能成功地与海浪搏斗，除非你能抓住它们，并在它们变得粗暴之前制服它们，否则就没有希望完美地征服任何激情。

translation.en: My last address was the best I ever delivered.
translation.zh: 我上次的演讲是我做过的最好的演讲。

translation.en: That you find in the life of all these great giants whom the world worships as its Prophets.
translation.zh: 你在所有这些伟大的巨人的生活中找到了这一点，他们被世界崇拜为先知。

translation.en: In each of these stages, the worshipper forms an ideal of God and follows it.
translation.zh: 在每一个阶段，敬拜者都会形成一个上帝的理想并遵循它。

translation.en: With a strong will, he fixes his mind on higher things and so attains to peace.
translation.zh: 凭借坚强的意志，他将思想固定在更高的事物上，从而获得和平。

translation.en: Then the four younger brothers went out with armies on a conquering expedition, each in a different direction, and brought all the kings under subjection to Yudhishthira. Returning, they laid all the vast wealth they secured at the feet of the eldest brother to meet the expenses of the great sacrifice.
translation.zh: 然后，四个弟弟率领军队出征征服，各自朝着不同的方向前进，并将所有国王都臣服于尤迪什提拉。回来后，他们把所有获得的巨额财富都放在了大哥的脚下，以支付大祭的开支。

translation.en: According to the law, they must not touch a warlike weapon, they must not wield a sword, they must not go into any enterprise that is dangerous.
translation.zh: 根据法律，他们不得触摸好战的武器，不得挥舞剑，不得从事任何危险的事业。

translation.en: They think they know everything of Jati Dharma, but really they know nothing of it.
translation.zh: 他们以为自己对贾提佛法了如指掌，但实际上他们对此一无所知。

translation.zh: 正如我已经说过的，人的个性是三分之二，而他的智力，他的话，只是三分之一。

translation.zh: 他们出生时绝望，他们必须留下来！

translation.zh: “我的儿子们，你们都是男人。这就是我想要的！如果你稍微成功一点，我就会觉得我的生活很有意义。（ND 5：17）

translation.en: This principle is at the root of those many rules which are so strictly enjoined in Hindu society — that we should take this sort and avoid that sort of food — though in many cases, forgetting their essential substance, the kernel, we are now busy only with quarrelling about the shell and keeping watch and ward over it.
translation.zh: 这个原则是印度教社会中严格遵守的许多规则的根源——我们应该采取这种食物，避免那种食物——尽管在许多情况下，忘记了它们的基本物质，即内核，我们现在只忙于争吵外壳，并监视和守护它。

translation.zh: 因此，人将永远把他的上帝拟人化，以便敬拜他。

translation.zh: 這些印象一直儲存在那裡，直到通過某種原因，心靈反應，光明來了，然後那個人就能說語言了。

translation.zh: 如果一个人在这里听从他主的指示，他就会被称为狂热分子。

translation.zh: 如果你把一个蓝色或绿色的玻璃杯放在灯前，那和灯有什么关系？

translation.zh: 话又说回来，这个世界是留给你去做善事的吗？

translation.zh: 很高兴从Jagamohan那里了解到Kumar（王子）Saheb的完全康复。我的事情进展顺利;希望你也一样。

translation.zh: ——一个人必须通过自己的努力来提高自己“——这在所有领域都适用。

translation.en: We know neither the sub-conscious, nor the super-conscious.

translation.zh: 回到家后，维亚达给了他一个座位，说：“在这里等着，”然后进了屋。

translation.zh: 他的妻子用她亲手准备的许多美味佳肴喂我。

translation.zh: 你是否因为没有教练和一对或随从的仆人而感到遗憾？

translation.zh: 我从未见过有人日复一日地主要靠酥油炸的东西为生。

translation.zh: 据说苏格拉底在与军队一起行军时，有一个美丽的日出，这在他的脑海中启动了一条思路;他在阳光下站了两天，完全昏迷不醒。

translation.en: Sometimes it is hard work to be tied to the shoestrings of a great name. And that was just what happened to my letter. You wrote on the 22nd January, 1901. You tied me to the latchet of a great name, Miss MacLeod. Consequently the letter has been following her up and down the world. Now it reached me yesterday from Japan, where Miss MacLeod is at present. Well, this, therefore, is the solution of the sphinx's riddle. "Thou shalt not join a great name with a small one."
translation.zh: 有时，被束缚在一个伟大名字的鞋带上是很困难的。这就是我的信所发生的事情。你写于1901年1月22日。你把我绑在一个大名字的门闩上，麦克劳德小姐。因此，这封信一直跟随她走遍世界。昨天，我从日本寄来了，麦克劳德小姐现在在那里。好吧，因此，这就是狮身人面像之谜的答案。“你不可把大名与小名连在一起。”

translation.en: Jnana is "creedlessness", but that does not mean that it despises creeds. It only means that a stage above and beyond creeds has been gained. translation.zh: Jnana是“无信条”，但这并不意味着它鄙视信条。这只意味着已经获得了超越信条的阶段。Jnâni 寻求的不是破坏，而是帮助所有人。正如所有的河流都把水滚入大海并成为一体一样，所有的信条都应该通向Jnana并成为一体。

translation.en: I have also my little plan. I do not know whether it will work or not, and I want to present it to you for discussion.
