translation.zh: “我不爱宗教。我已经认同它了。这是我的生活。因此，没有人喜欢他一生都在做的事情，他确实取得了一些成就。我们所爱的还不是我们自己。你的丈夫不喜欢他一直坚持的音乐。他热爱工程学，而他对工程学知之甚少。这就是 Bhakti 和 Jnana 之间的区别;这就是为什么 Jnana 比 Bhakti 更伟大。（LSN I：216）

translation.en: In all the ancient religions which have come down to us at the present day, we find one claim made — that they are all supernatural, that their genesis is not, as it were, in the human brain, but that they have originated somewhere outside of it.
translation.zh: 在今天流传下来的所有古代宗教中，我们发现有一种说法——它们都是超自然的，它们的起源不是在人脑中，而是起源于人脑之外的某个地方。

translation.en: Before I knew the customs of this country, I received such a shock when the son, in a very refined family, got up and called the mother by name!
translation.zh: 在我还不知道这个国家的习俗之前，当儿子在一个非常精致的家庭中站起来叫妈妈的名字时，我感到非常震惊！

translation.en: Swamiji: That tendency comes as a result of one's own past actions (Karma); everything one has is of his own doing. Hence it follows that it is solely in the hands of every individual to control his tendencies and to guide them properly.
translation.zh: 斯瓦米吉：这种倾向是自己过去行为的结果（业力）;一个人所拥有的一切都是他自己做的。因此，控制自己的倾向并正确地引导它们完全掌握在每个人的手中。

translation.en: His intense love for mankind would not let him refuse to help even the humblest of the thousands who sought his aid.
translation.zh: 他对人类的强烈爱不会让他拒绝帮助成千上万寻求他帮助的人中最卑微的人。

translation.en: Do not say “my house," do not say "my body".
translation.zh: 不要说“我的房子”，不要说“我的身体”。

translation.en: It is a vast subject, and I can only point out to you now the central idea of this Yoga.
translation.zh: 这是一个广阔的主题，我现在只能向你指出这个瑜伽的中心思想。

translation.en: When by means of discrimination that limiting condition vanishes and the Jiva is bereft of all adjuncts, then how can there be bondage for the Atman which is of the essence of transcendent Intelligence?
translation.zh: 当通过辨别，限制条件消失了，吉瓦失去了所有的附属物，那么，作为超验智慧本质的阿特曼怎么会有束缚呢？

translation.en: "The aim of the ideal religion should be to help one to live and to prepare one to die at the same time."
translation.zh: “理想宗教的目的应该是帮助一个人活着，同时为一个人的死亡做好准备。”

translation.en: For behind that non-injury lay a dreadful weakness.
translation.zh: 因为在这种不受伤的背后隐藏着一个可怕的弱点。

translation.en: Knowing your native kindness of heart, I think I am not disturbing you by asking and entreating you to do something for this young man.
translation.zh: 我知道你天生的善良之心，我想我不是在打扰你，要求和恳求你为这个年轻人做点什么。

translation.en: In all sensible religions, they never allow prayers to God; they allow prayers to gods.
translation.zh: 在所有明智的宗教中，他们从不允许向上帝祈祷;他们允许向神祈祷。

translation.en: Do you want me to be the founder of another such?"
translation.zh: 你想让我成为另一个这样的公司的创始人吗？

translation.en: "Excuse me saying that there do not seem many signs; of it just now."
translation.zh: “对不起，似乎没有多少迹象;刚才。

translation.en: We give the first place to desires for enjoyment, either in this or another life.
translation.zh: 我们把享受的欲望放在第一位，无论是在今生还是来生。

translation.en: One says, "If you pray to God facing the East, then you will reach Him."
translation.zh: 有人说：“如果你面向东方向上帝祈祷，那么你就会接触到他。

translation.en: ou mar my doctrines wronging, baulking.
translation.zh: ou mar my doctrines wronging， baulking.

translation.en: Send the money to Saradananda in the Math, as I will be away in the hills.
translation.zh: 把钱寄给数学中的萨拉达南达，因为我将离开山上。

translation.en: We have seen that it is the universal cosmic mind that splits itself into the Akasha and Prana, and beyond mind we have found the soul in us.
translation.zh: 我们已经看到，是宇宙的心灵分裂成阿卡莎和普拉纳，在心灵之外，我们找到了我们的灵魂。

translation.en: I shall go on working for the good of men, without caring in the least for the criticisms of others — it is in this sense that the expression, "Men are to be ignored like worms", has been used.
translation.zh: 我将继续为人类的利益而努力，丝毫不顾及别人的批评——正是在这个意义上，“人应该像虫子一样被忽视”这句话被使用了。

translation.en: And indeed as we went through the countrysides of northern India this summer, we had many chances of noting how deep this Krishna myth had set its mark upon the people. The songs that dancers chanted as they danced in the roadside hamlets were all of Râdhâ and Krishna. And the Swami was fond of a statement, as to which we, of course, could have no opinion, that the Krishna-worshippers of India had exhausted the possibilities of the romantic motive in lyric poetry. . . .
translation.zh: 事实上，今年夏天，当我们穿过印度北部的乡村时，我们有很多机会注意到这个克里希纳神话在人们身上留下了多么深刻的印记。舞者在路边小村庄跳舞时吟唱的歌曲都是 Râdhâ 和 Krishna。斯瓦米喜欢这样一种说法，我们当然不能对此发表任何意见，即印度的克里希纳崇拜者已经用尽了抒情诗中浪漫主义动机的可能性。

translation.en: ye prophets! Speak Thou alone, O Lord, unto my soul!
translation.zh: 先知们！主啊，求你单单对我的灵魂说话！

translation.en: And I in common with my people pray that the blessings of God may rest on you and your labours.
translation.zh: 我和我的子民一样祈祷，愿上帝的祝福降临在你和你的劳动上。

translation.en: Swamiji: (Humorously caricaturing the name of the magazine) Have you seen the Udbandhana ? (The word means "suicide by hanging".)
translation.zh: 斯瓦米吉：（幽默地讽刺杂志的名字）你看过乌德班达纳吗？（这个词的意思是“上吊自杀”。

translation.en: For instance, it is absolutely necessary for you, instead of frittering away your energy and often talking of idle nonsense, to learn from the Englishman the idea of prompt obedience to leaders, the absence of jealousy, the indomitable perseverance and the undying faith in himself.
translation.zh: 例如，你绝对有必要向英国人学习迅速服从领袖、不嫉妒、不屈不挠的毅力和对自己不朽的信念，而不是消耗你的精力并经常谈论无聊的废话。

translation.en: Don't listen to the words of those who say, "We shall both live the worldly life and be knowers of Brahman."
translation.zh: 不要听那些人的话，“我们既要过世俗的生活，又要认识婆罗门。

translation.en: The scenery today I am passing through is much like the neighborhood of Delhi, the beginning of a big desert, bleak hills, scanty, thorny shrubs, very little water. The little streams are frozen, but during the middle of the day it is hot. Must be [illegible] I presume, in summer.
translation.zh: 我今天经过的风景很像德里附近，大沙漠的起点，荒凉的山丘，稀疏的荆棘灌木，很少的水。小溪结冰了，但在中午很热。我猜一定是[难以辨认]的，在夏天。

translation.en: Yama, Niyama, Âsana, Prânâyâma, Pratyâhâra, Dhârâna, Dhyâna, and Samâdhi are the steps in Raja-Yoga, of which non-injury, truthfulness, non-covetousness, chastity, not receiving anything from another are called Yama.
translation.zh: Yama、Niyama、Âsana、Prânâyâma、Pratyâhâra、Dhârâna、Dhyâna 和 Samâdhi 是 Raja-Yoga 中的步骤，其中不伤害、诚实、不贪婪、贞洁、不从他人那里得到任何东西被称为 Yama。

translation.en: Have the men of our country the power left in them to take up and practice true religion?
translation.zh: 我们国家的男人有没有能力接受和实践真正的宗教？

translation.en: The sterling virtues of Yudhishthira and the valour and devotion of his other brothers aroused jealousies in the hearts of the sons of the blind king, and at the instigation of Duryodhana, the eldest of them, the five Pandava brothers were prevailed upon to visit Vâranâvata, on the plea of a religious festival that was being held there.
translation.zh: 尤迪什提拉的美德和他其他兄弟的英勇和奉献引起了盲人国王的儿子们的嫉妒，在他们中最年长的杜律达那的怂恿下，潘达瓦五兄弟被说服去拜访瓦拉纳瓦塔，请求在那里举行的宗教节日。

translation.en: Tom dies and there is not a ripple anywhere upon the surface of the earth.
translation.zh: 汤姆死了，地球表面没有一丝涟漪。

translation.en: By the light of his personality Eastern Bengal is radiant.
translation.zh: 由于他的个性，东孟加拉邦是光芒四射的。

translation.en: For example, force is latent in the man's arm until he strikes a blow, when he translates it into activity.
translation.zh: 例如，力量潜伏在男人的手臂上，直到他受到打击，当他将其转化为活动时。

translation.en: Disciples pay their whole attention to the preservation of their master's name and throw overboard his teachings; and sectarianism etc., are the result.
translation.zh: 门徒们全神贯注于维护他们师父的名字，并把他的教义抛在脑后;和宗派主义等，是结果。

translation.en: He would have to attain more relative knowledge just as we do, though on account of his immense power, he would learn it far more quickly.
translation.zh: 他必须像我们一样获得更多的相对知识，尽管由于他的巨大力量，他会更快地学会这些知识。

translation.en: It is the nature of man to think and therein he differs from animals.
translation.zh: 思考是人的天性，在这一点上他与动物不同。

translation.en: And this is what the Yogis say, that all great incarnations and prophets are such men; that they reached perfection in this one life.
translation.zh: 这就是瑜伽士所说的，所有伟大的化身和先知都是这样的人;他们在这一生达到了完美。

translation.en: The ocean in its fullness cannot be contained within its shores, I am sure.
translation.zh: 我敢肯定，丰满的海洋不能被限制在它的海岸内。

translation.en: During the reign of the last of the Mogul emperors — the cruel man who destroyed that most brilliant empire of India — he similarly heard of the beauty of a Rajput chieftain's daughter. Orders were sent that she should be brought to the Mogul harem.
translation.zh: 在最后一位莫卧儿皇帝统治期间——那个残忍的人摧毁了印度最辉煌的帝国——他同样听说过拉其普特酋长女儿的美貌。下令将她带到莫卧儿后宫。

translation.en: According to the orthodox Hindus, the Vedas are not the written words at all, but they consist of the words themselves orally spoken with the exact enunciation and intonation.
translation.zh: 根据正统的印度教徒的说法，吠陀经根本不是书面文字，而是由文字本身以准确的发音和语调口头说出。

translation.en: There is more chance of working my plans out in the East than in the West, as it now appears.
translation.zh: 现在看来，在东方比在西方实施我的计划的机会更大。

translation.en: In one life they perfect themselves; they have no thought for anything else, never live a moment for any other idea, and thus the way is shortened for them.
translation.zh: 在一生中，他们完善了自己;他们没有想过别的，从来没有为任何其他想法活过片刻，因此对他们来说，道路被缩短了。

translation.en: Each one believed in the Upanishads as the sole authority, but thought that they preached one thing, one path only.
translation.zh: 每个人都相信奥义书是唯一的权威，但认为他们只传讲一件事，一条道路。

translation.en: This world, if you have the eyes to see, is yours — if not, it is mine; do you think that anyone waits for another?
translation.zh: 这个世界，如果你有眼睛能看到，那就是你的——如果没有，那就是我的;你认为有人在等待另一个人吗？

translation.en: But I hope the time will come when you will see clearer, know better, and think other thoughts than you are now doing.
translation.zh: 但我希望有一天，你会比现在看得更清楚，知道得更好，并思考其他想法。

translation.en: He said that religion was the most wonderful factor in the social organism.
translation.zh: 他说，宗教是社会有机体中最美妙的因素。

translation.en: You must pay them, worship them, place everything in their hands.
translation.zh: 你必须付钱给他们，崇拜他们，把一切都交到他们手中。

translation.en: The so-called great men of the world may all be seen to become jealous of each other for a small name, for a little fame, and for a few bits of gold.
translation.zh: 世上所谓的伟人，可能都为了一个小名气、一点名气、几点金子而互相嫉妒。

translation.en: Still we are all believers in God; that is to say, that man who does not believe in a most marvellous Infinite Power from which everything has come, in which everything lives, and to which everything must in the end return, cannot be called a Hindu.
translation.zh: 尽管如此，我们都是上帝的信徒;也就是说，不相信万物从中产生的最奇妙的无限力量的人，万物都生活在其中，万物最终都必须回归，就不能被称为印度教徒。

translation.en: How can this little bit of projection be explained, be understood, without.
translation.zh: 这点投射怎么能被解释，被理解，没有。

translation.en: The river is rising, flooding the banks; the ponds and tanks have overflowed.
translation.zh: 河水上涨，淹没了河岸;池塘和水箱已经溢出。

translation.en: However, only the preface to The Imitation of Christ was published in the English edition of the Complete Works, VIII.
translation.zh: 然而，只有《效法基督》的序言发表在英文版的《全集》第八版中。

translation.en: All the other particulars about it and its author are for the enjoyment of the learned.
translation.zh: 关于它及其作者的所有其他细节都供有学问的人欣赏。

translation.en: The Upanishads, the Vyâsa-Sutras , and the Gita, therefore, have been taken up by every sect in India that wants to claim authority for orthodoxy, whether dualist, or Vishishtâdvaitist, or Advaitist; the authorities of each of these are the three Prasthanas.
translation.zh: 因此，《奥义书》、《维萨经》和《吉塔》已被印度每个想要声称正统权威的教派所接受，无论是二元论者、毗湿论者还是阿德瓦特主义者;其中每一个的权威都是三个 Prasthanas。

translation.en: Swamiji: So it will be. If you have earnestness of desire, it will certainly be.
translation.zh: 斯瓦米吉：会的。如果你有真诚的愿望，它肯定会。

translation.en: We all have to attain [perfection] some time or other.
translation.zh: 我们都必须在某个时候达到[完美]。

translation.en: "But the ceremonies employed must themselves be Vedic. There must be a Vedic altar, on which at the hour of worship to light the Vedic fire. And the children must be present to share in the service of oblation. This is a rite which would claim the respect of the whole of India.
translation.zh: “但所采用的仪式本身必须是吠陀式的。必须有一个吠陀祭坛，在崇拜时点燃吠陀之火。孩子们必须在场，才能分担祭祀服务。这是一个需要整个印度尊重的仪式。

translation.en: Now on these lines a most impressive and beautiful life can be written.
translation.zh: 现在，在这些字里行间，可以写出最令人印象深刻和最美丽的生活。

translation.en: Why should there be serpent, or ghost, or demon worship and all these various creeds and forms for having miracles?
translation.zh: 为什么会有蛇、鬼、鬼崇拜，以及所有这些不同的信条和形式来创造奇迹？

translation.en: We made our choice ages ago, and we must abide by it.
translation.zh: 我们很久以前就做出了选择，我们必须遵守它。

translation.en: It does not matter who preaches Ramakrishna Paramahamsa, whether I, or you, or anybody else.
translation.zh: 谁宣讲罗摩克里希纳·帕拉马罕萨并不重要，无论是我，还是你，还是其他任何人。

translation.en: The education which does not help the common mass of people to equip themselves for the struggle for life, which does not bring out strength of character, a spirit of philanthropy, and the courage of a lion — is it worth the name?
translation.zh: 教育不能帮助普通群众为生活而奋斗，不能带出性格的力量、慈善精神和狮子的勇气——它配得上这个名字吗？

translation.en: Let rays of light come in, in sharp-driving showers from the four quarters of the earth; let the intense flood of light flow in from the West — what of that?
translation.zh: 让光线从地球的四面八方射进来，在尖锐的阵雨中;让强烈的光线从西方涌入——那又如何呢？

translation.en: The subject of his sermon was the love of God, and his treatment of the theme was eloquent and unique.
translation.zh: 他讲道的主题是上帝的爱，他对主题的处理是雄辩而独特的。

translation.en: The body in which one becomes an Acharya is very different from that of any other man.
translation.zh: 一个人成为阿查里亚的身体与任何其他人的身体都非常不同。

translation.en: It is a matter of great regret that you too have fallen ill.
translation.zh: 你也病倒了，这是一件非常遗憾的事情。

translation.en: All that is bliss, even in the lowest sense, is but the reflection of Him.
translation.zh: 所有幸福，即使是在最低的意义上，也不过是他的反映。

translation.en: Our temples are not churches in your sense of the word, they are not places for public worship; for, properly speaking, there is no such thing as public worship in India.
translation.zh: 我们的圣殿不是你意义上的教堂，它们不是公众敬拜的地方;因为，正确地说，印度没有公开崇拜这样的东西。

translation.en: We must get beyond emotionalism if we would be able to renounce. Emotion belongs to the animals. They are creatures of emotion entirely.
translation.zh: 如果我们能够放弃，我们必须超越情感主义。情感属于动物。他们完全是情感的生物。

translation.en: But if that man increases in knowledge, his happiness will increase, the intellect will open to him, and his sense-enjoyment will evolve into intellectual enjoyment.
translation.zh: 但是，如果这个人的知识增加，他的幸福就会增加，智力就会向他敞开，他的感官享受就会演变成智力的享受。

translation.en: Disciple: What should we do then to remove that evil?
translation.zh: 门徒：那我们该怎么做才能除去那邪恶呢？

translation.en: Nay, the whole of nature from the very sun to the atoms is under law, and even for man there is no freedom.
translation.zh: 不，从太阳到原子的整个自然界都在法律之下，即使对人类来说也没有自由。

translation.en: Our difficulty in life is that we are guided by the present and not by the future.
translation.zh: 我们生活中的困难在于，我们被现在而不是未来所引导。

translation.en: To work without motive, to work unattached, brings the highest bliss and freedom.
translation.zh: 没有动机地工作，无依附地工作，会带来最高的幸福和自由。

translation.en: They are like the actors whose play is over, but who, after their work is done, return to please others.
translation.zh: 他们就像演员一样，他们的戏剧结束了，但在他们的工作完成后，他们回来取悦别人。

translation.en: Both the forces of good and evil will keep the universe alive for us, until we awake from our dreams and give up this building of mud pies.
translation.zh: 善与恶的力量都会为我们保持宇宙的活力，直到我们从梦中醒来，放弃这个泥馅饼的建筑。

translation.en: Believing certain things because an organised body of priests tells him to believe, believing because it is written in certain books, believing because his people like him to believe, the modern man knows to be impossible for him.
translation.zh: 相信某些事情是因为有组织的祭司团体告诉他要相信，相信是因为写在某些书上，相信是因为他的人民喜欢他相信，现代人知道对他来说是不可能的。

translation.en: In all the religions of the world you will find it claimed that there is a unity within us.
translation.zh: 在世界上所有的宗教中，你会发现它声称我们内在有一个统一。

translation.en: Animals are living upon plants, men upon animals and, worst of all, upon one another, the strong upon the weak.
translation.zh: 动物以植物为生，人以动物为生，最糟糕的是，强者以弱者为生。

translation.en: Verily in this alone I realise his mercy, that to me, this lowly creature, He has extended the privilege of sitting and mixing on the same footing with you Sannyasins, pure from your childhood, who have renounced all lust and lucre."
translation.zh: 仅凭这一点，我才真正体会到他的怜悯，对我这个卑微的生物来说，他已经给予了与你们桑雅生坐在同等地位上和交往的特权，他们从童年时代就纯洁，放弃了所有的欲望和金钱。

translation.en: Mrs. Patterson and children are off to Europe. General [C. B. Patterson] is alone and very desirous that I would call. I will the next time I go to town.
translation.zh: 帕特森太太和孩子们要去欧洲了。[C.B.帕特森]将军是孤独的，我非常渴望我打电话。下次我去城里我会的。

translation.en: The question is not whether she ever lived, whether the story is history or not, we know that the ideal is there.
translation.zh: 问题不在于她是否曾经活过，无论这个故事是否是历史，我们知道理想就在那里。

translation.en: When asked on another occasion why he, a great Yogi, should perform Karma, such as pouring oblations into the sacrificial fire, and worshipping the image of Shri Raghunâthji, which are practices only meant for beginners, the reply came: "Why do you take for granted that everybody makes Karma for his own good? Cannot one perform Karma for others?"
translation.zh: 在另一个场合，当被问及为什么他，一个伟大的瑜伽士，应该进行业力，例如将祭品倒入祭祀火中，并崇拜Shri Raghunâthji的形象，这些都是只为初学者准备的练习时，回答说：“为什么你理所当然地认为每个人都为自己的利益而制造业力？一个人不能为别人做业力吗？

translation.en: Whether men understand it or not, they are impelled by that power behind to become unselfish.

translation.zh: 从本质上讲，所有教派和所有宗教都有相同的目标;他们只是为了自己的自私目的而争吵——他们不是为真理而焦虑，而是为“我的名字”和“你的名字”而焦虑。

translation.en: Will you kindly order 100 photographs from Harrison, and send them over to India to Ramdayal Chakravarty, c/o Swami Ramakrishnananda, Varahanagar Math, Alambazar, Calcutta? I will pay for it when I come to Chicago.
translation.zh: 您能否从哈里森订购 100 张照片，并将它们寄往印度的 Ramdayal Chakravarty， c/o Swami Ramakrishnananda， Varahanagar Math， Alambazar， Calcutta？当我来到芝加哥时，我会付钱的。

translation.en: Very kind of you to send up a man inquiring about my health and comfort. But that's quite of a piece with your fatherly character. I am all right here. Your kindness has left nothing more to be desired here. I hope soon to see you in a few days. I don't require any conveyance while going down. Descent is very bad, and the ascent is the worst part of the job, that's the same in everything in the world. My heartful gratitude to you.
translation.zh: 你很友善地派人来询问我的健康和舒适。但这与你父亲的性格相当吻合。我在这里没事。你的善意在这里没有留下任何可取之处。我希望几天后能见到你。下山时我不需要任何交通工具。下降是非常糟糕的，上升是工作中最糟糕的部分，这在世界上的所有事情中都是一样的。我衷心感谢你。

translation.en: Every enterprise in this country takes some time to have a go.
translation.zh: 这个国家的每家企业都需要一些时间来尝试。

translation.en: Yet the growing plant must be hedged round to protect it until it has grown into a tree.
translation.zh: 然而，生长中的植物必须被篱笆以保护它，直到它长成一棵树。

translation.en: Mixture of castes, though not absolutely forbidden, entails disadvantage on the children.
translation.zh: 种姓混合虽然不是绝对禁止的，但会给儿童带来不利条件。

translation.en: A man blames me, and I immediately react in the form of anger.
translation.zh: 一个男人责怪我，我立即以愤怒的形式做出反应。

translation.en: Again a member of the old royal family of France was reinstated as king.
translation.zh: 法国旧王室的一名成员再次被恢复为国王。

translation.en: If you are perfectly pure and practice faithfully, your mind can finally be made a searchlight of infinite power.
translation.zh: 如果你是完全清净的，并忠实地修行，你的心最终可以成为无限力量的探照灯。

translation.en: PS. I do not any more doubt my ultimate cure; you ought to see me working like a steam engine cooking, eating anything and everything, and, all the same, sleeping well and keeping well!
translation.zh: 我不再怀疑我的最终治愈;你应该看到我像蒸汽机一样做饭，什么都吃，而且，同样，睡得好，保得好！

translation.en: But thinking all the time that we are diseased will not cure us — medicine is necessary.
translation.zh: 但是，一直认为我们生病并不能治愈我们——药物是必要的。

translation.en: So far about work. Now about you personally. Such love and faith and devotion and appreciation like yours, dear Miss Noble, repays a hundred times over any amount of labour one undergoes in this life. May all blessings be yours. My whole life is at your service, as we may say in our mother tongue.
translation.zh: 到目前为止关于工作。现在关于你个人。亲爱的贵族小姐，像您这样的爱、信仰、奉献和欣赏，比一个人今生所经历的任何劳动都要付出一百倍的回报。愿所有的祝福都是你的。我的一生都在为你服务，正如我们用我们的母语所说的那样。

translation.en: As the life blood of every nation was to be found in the schools, where boys and girls were receiving their education, it was absolutely essential that the young students should be pure, and this purity must be taught them.
translation.zh: 由于每个民族的生命之血都存在于男孩和女孩接受教育的学校中，因此，年轻学生必须保持纯洁，并且必须教他们这种纯洁。

translation.en: Naked I came out of my mother's womb and naked I return. Helpless I came and helpless I go. Helpless I am now. And we do not know [the goal]. It is terrible for us to think about it. We get such odd ideas! We go to a medium and see if the ghost can help us. Think of the weakness! Ghosts, devils, gods, anybody — come on! And all the priests, all the charlatans! That is just the time they get hold of us, the moment we are weak. Then they bring in all the gods.
translation.zh: 我赤身裸体地从母亲的子宫里出来，赤身裸体地回来了。无助的我来了，无助的我走了。我现在很无助。我们不知道[目标]。我们想想就很可怕。我们得到了如此奇怪的想法！我们去找一个媒介，看看鬼魂是否能帮助我们。想想弱点！鬼魂、魔鬼、神灵，任何人——来吧！还有所有的牧师，所有的江湖骗子！那只是他们抓住我们的时候，我们软弱的那一刻。然后他们把所有的神都带进来。

translation.en: On reason we must have to lay our foundation, we must follow reason as far as it leads, and when reason fails, reason itself will show us the way to the highest plane.
translation.zh: 在理性上，我们必须奠定我们的基础，我们必须遵循理性，当理性失败时，理性本身将向我们指明通往最高层次的道路。

translation.en: After half an hour, Swamiji seemed to show signs of a return to external consciousness.
translation.zh: 半小时后，斯瓦米吉似乎显示出恢复外部意识的迹象。

translation.en: According to the Christian view, God will judge all beings on the last day (the day of the dissolution of the world), and will award heaven or hell according to the virtues or vices of different individuals.

translation.en: (Bhagavata ) — "Unto them appeared Krishna with a smile on His lotus face, clad in yellow robes and having garlands on, the embodied conqueror (in beauty) of the god of love."
translation.zh: “（《博伽瓦塔》）——”克里希纳在他们面前显现，他的莲花脸上带着微笑，穿着黄色的长袍，戴着花环，是爱神的化身征服者（在美丽中）。

translation.en: Dash, pluck, fight, all these things are weakness."
translation.zh: 冲刺、拔毛、打架，这些都是弱点。

translation.en: I do not mean that a man should compromise his heart for his brain or vice versa, but let everyone have an infinite amount of heart and feeling, and at the same time an infinite amount of reason.
translation.zh: 我并不是说一个人应该为了他的大脑而牺牲他的心，反之亦然，而是让每个人都有无限的心灵和感情，同时拥有无限的理性。

translation.en: Even the voting by ballot is there five hundred and sixty years before Christ.
translation.zh: 甚至投票在基督之前五百六十年就已经存在了。

translation.en: And the day they leave off [this habit] will be a sorry day for the ancestors.
translation.zh: 他们离开[这个习惯]的那一天，对祖先来说将是遗憾的一天。

translation.zh: 〔你可以回答〕，“但〔还有〕夺动物生命的罪;你将不得不为此受苦。

translation.zh: 虽然起初提出了很多反对意见，但维亚萨宣布，这些王子可以允许这样的婚姻，而且是允许的。于是德鲁巴达国王不得不屈服于这种一夫多妻制的婚姻，公主嫁给了潘杜的五个儿子。

translation.zh: 要对所有这些问题给出一个决定性的答案是极其困难的。

translation.en: And, besides, they have got the wonderful strength that comes of a pure and moral life, which is not to be found anywhere else in the world.
translation.zh: 此外，他们还拥有纯洁和道德生活所带来的奇妙力量，这在世界其他任何地方都找不到。

translation.en: From here the Buddhist religion spread to Burma, Siam, and other countries.
translation.zh: 从这里，佛教传播到缅甸、暹罗和其他国家。

translation.zh: “如果我长大了，我的弹珠会变成什么样子？

translation.zh: 站起来，把你的肩膀放在方向盘上——这辈子能活多久？

translation.en: It necessarily follows that law is possible only within this conditioned universe; beyond it there cannot be any law.
translation.zh: 必然地，只有在这个有条件的宇宙中，法律才有可能;在它之外，不可能有任何法律。

translation.en: Next come the Christians, with [a] good many things to teach.
translation.zh: 接下来是基督徒，他们有很多东西要教导。

translation.zh: 然而，这种对偶像的外在崇拜在我们所有的沙斯特拉斯中被描述为所有低级崇拜形式中最低级的。

translation.en: When I see another, I must take all the consequences and put in the third, the ideal, which stands between us; that is the apex of the triangle.
translation.zh: 当我看到另一个时，我必须承担所有后果，并放入第三个，即我们之间的理想;那是三角形的顶点。

translation.zh: Bholâchand 非常高兴听到一些人的这个消息;他时不时地用尖锐的音符大声喊道：“我已经皈依了主。

translation.en: The knowledge of Brahman is the ultimate goal — the highest destiny of man.
translation.zh: 婆罗门的知识是人类的终极目标——人类的最高命运。

translation.zh: 宗教的證明取決於人類構成的真理，而不是任何書籍。

translation.zh: 我不认为现在把报纸做成月刊是件好事，除非你有把握给一个大块头。

translation.en: But even in this bondage my real Self is not completely lost.
translation.zh: 但即使在这种束缚中，我的真实自我也没有完全迷失。

translation.en: They were not got in this present life; therefore, they must have come down from past lives.
translation.zh: 他们没有在今生得到;因此，他们一定是从前世下来的。

translation.en: India's society is the cradle of my infancy, the pleasure-garden of my youth, the sacred heaven, the Varanasi of my old age."
translation.zh: 印度社会是我婴儿时期的摇篮，是我年轻时的游乐花园，是神圣的天堂，是我老年的瓦拉纳西。

translation.en: To judge the apple tree you must take the apple standard, and for the oak, its own standard.
translation.zh: 要判断苹果树，你必须采用苹果标准，而对于橡树，你必须采取自己的标准。

translation.en: When I look at you and speak to you, both the organs and the instruments are active.
translation.zh: 当我看着你和你说话时，器官和乐器都是活跃的。

translation.en: Therefore, it is my proposal tonight to bring before you points where we are agreed, to find out, if we can, a ground of agreement; and if through the grace of the Lord such a state of things be possible, let us take it up, and from theory carry it out into practice.
translation.zh: 因此，我今晚的提议是向你们提出我们达成一致意见的要点，如果可能的话，找出达成协议的理由。如果通过主的恩典，这种状态是可能的，让我们接受它，并从理论上将其付诸实践。

translation.en: They are as tremendously individualistic — that is to say, after laying down all these minute regulations.
translation.zh: 他们同样具有极大的个人主义——也就是说，在制定了所有这些细微的规定之后。

translation.en: They do not take meat, but live somehow on the scanty diet of rice and all sorts of vegetables.
translation.zh: 他们不吃肉，但以某种方式以米饭和各种蔬菜的稀缺饮食为生。

translation.en: And so in every science, it is addition that is the law.
translation.zh: 因此，在每门科学中，加法就是定律。

translation.zh: 食物的生理意义是吸收来自太阳的能量。

translation.en: This scene outside is the soul, and the screen between us and the scenery is Mâyâ — time, space, and causation.
translation.zh: 外面的这个场景是灵魂，我们和风景之间的屏幕是Mâyâ——时间、空间和因果关系。

translation.en: Throughout the history of the world, we find that man is trying to grasp the abstract through thought-forms, or symbols.
translation.zh: 纵观世界历史，我们发现人类试图通过思维形式或符号来把握抽象的东西。

translation.en: To return to our main story. We left the Pandava brothers in exile. Even there they were not allowed to remain unmolested from the evil plots of Duryodhana; but all of them were futile.
translation.zh: 回到我们的主要故事。我们让潘达瓦兄弟流亡。即使在那里，他们也不被允许不受 Duryodhana 邪恶阴谋的骚扰;但所有这些都是徒劳的。

translation.en: As we have seen, the law of reason says, the particular is only known through the general.
translation.zh: 正如我们所看到的，理性法则说，只有通过一般才能知道特殊性。

translation.en: If it is a truth that by your own past action you have got this body; then, nullifying the effects of evil works by good works, why should you not be a Jivanmukta in this very body?
translation.zh: 如果通过你自己过去的行为，你已经得到了这个身体，这是一个事实;那么，用善行来抵消恶行的影响，你为什么不在这个身体里做一个Jivanmukta呢？

translation.en: The Sankhyas also tell us the same thing The former is a statement on the physical side, and the latter on the psychological side; yet both are the same.
translation.zh: 僧伽也告诉我们同样的事情：前者是身体方面的陈述，后者是心理方面的陈述;然而两者都是一样的。

translation.en: Out of long churning comes butter, and this butter is God.
translation.zh: 长时间搅拌产生黄油，这种黄油就是上帝。

translation.en: In their haste, they laid all the evils in our society at the door of religion; and like the man in the story, wanting to kill the mosquito that sat on a friend's forehead, they were trying to deal such heavy blows as would have killed man and mosquito together.
translation.zh: 他们匆匆忙忙地把我们社会上所有的罪恶都放在了宗教的门口;就像故事中的那个人一样，他们想杀死坐在朋友额头上的蚊子，他们试图给予如此沉重的打击，就像杀死人和蚊子一样。

translation.zh: 之后的谈话转向了宗教的话题。斯瓦米·维韦·卡南达（Swami Vive Kananda）表示，世界宗教议会是有益的，因为它在拓宽思想方面做了很多工作。

translation.en: It also led to many superstitions, through clinging to old forms after all sense of their meaning had been lost.
translation.zh: 这也导致了许多迷信，在失去所有意义之后，通过坚持旧的形式。

translation.en: Other letters you may send me after hearing from me from Dehra Dun.
translation.zh: 在收到 Dehra Dun 的来信后，您可以寄给我的其他信件。

translation.en: I like Mr. [Tokuno] Oda much — he means business.
translation.zh: 我非常喜欢织田德野先生——他认真做生意。

translation.zh: 例如，接受灵魂的危险在于，它把瞬间的情感误认为是真正的宗教渴望。

translation.en: [Man began to progress spiritually] when he kicked the devil out.
translation.zh: 〔人〕在灵性上开始进步〕，当他把魔鬼赶出去时。

translation.zh: 同样，创造的事实本身，投射的事实也与名称和形式永远联系在一起。

translation.en: I have travelled eight years and not seen many of the masterpieces.
translation.zh: 我旅行了八年，没有看到很多杰作。

translation.zh: 在这里，大地有时被寡妇的眼泪浸透;在西方，空气中弥漫着未婚者的叹息。

translation.en: Others are all trying to make us run in the old groove, forcing us all to think alike.
translation.zh: 其他人都试图让我们在旧的节奏中奔跑，迫使我们所有人都以同样的方式思考。

translation.en: My love to the holy family in Chicago, and hope surely to be able to come West and have great fun.
translation.zh: 我对芝加哥的神圣家庭的爱，并希望能够来到西部，享受极大的乐趣。

translation.en: It is the Jnana-kanda or the Vedanta only that has for all time commanded recognition for leading men across Maya and bestowing salvation on them through the practice of Yoga, Bhakti, Jnana, or selfless work; and as its validity and authority remain unaffected by any limitations of time, place or persons, it is the only exponent of the universal and eternal religion for all mankind.
translation.zh: 只有 Jnana-kanda 或吠檀多一直以来都因带领玛雅人并通过练习瑜伽、奉爱、Jnana 或无私的工作赋予他们救赎而获得认可;由于它的有效性和权威性不受任何时间、地点或人物的限制，它是全人类普遍和永恒宗教的唯一代表。

translation.en: To prevent this you must make all and everything work through that vitality of your religion.
translation.zh: 为了防止这种情况，你必须通过你宗教的活力让所有和每件事都发挥作用。

translation.zh: 如果一个教派崇拜一种奇特的象征，另一个教派就会说：“哦，这太可怕了！

translation.zh: 在每个国家，你都必须通过他们的方法工作。

translation.zh: 当他降落在纽约的街道上时，他发现一位穿着考究的绅士握着他的手;一个衣衫褴褛，另一个衣衫褴褛，这没什么区别。

translation.zh: 就这样，大概过了两三个小时，我嘴里却没有一句话。

translation.zh: 然后，波士顿的布尔夫人发言，开始解释世界上所有的困难是如何因为不了解两性之间的真正关系而造成的。她说：“唯一的灵丹妙药是正确理解正确的人，然后在爱中找到自由，在自由和母性中找到自由，兄弟情谊，父亲身份，神性，在自由中找到爱，在爱中找到自由，在性中正确地坚持真正的理想。

translation.zh: 如果人被外在原因所束缚，他就只能是凡人。

translation.en: On the one hand the Sankhya system comes to nature, and then at once it has to jump over to the other side and come to the soul, which is entirely separate from nature.
translation.zh: 一方面，Sankhya系统来到自然界，然后它必须立即跳到另一边，来到与自然完全分离的灵魂。

translation.en: Nothing is easier to say, "I work for work's sake", but nothing is so difficult to attain.
translation.zh: 没有什么比说“我为工作而工作”更容易的了，但没有什么比这更难实现的了。

translation.en: Electric motion makes the molecules of a body move in the same direction.
translation.zh: 电运动使物体的分子沿同一方向运动。

translation.en: Getting up from bed in the morning, I found that we were within the enclosed space of the Madras harbour.
translation.zh: 早上起床，我发现我们在马德拉斯港的封闭空间内。

translation.en: We shall have to begin now in the concrete, through forms and words, prayers and ceremonies; and of these concrete forms there will be thousands; one form need not be for everybody.
translation.zh: 我们现在必须从具体开始，通过形式和言语、祈祷和仪式;在这些具体形式中，将有成千上万的形式;一种形式不一定适合所有人。

translation.en: 93. While visiting the Taj at Agra he remarked: "If you squeeze a bit of this marble, it will drip drops of royal love and its sorrow." Further he observed, "It takes really six months to study a square inch of its interior works of beauty."
translation.zh: 93. 在参观阿格拉的泰姬陵时，他说：“如果你挤一点这块大理石，它会滴下皇室的爱和悲伤的水滴。他进一步指出，“研究一平方英寸的室内美作品真的需要六个月的时间。

translation.en: Swamiji: Do you see yourself that you have eyes?
translation.zh: 斯瓦米吉：你看到自己有眼睛了吗？

translation.en: The whole of life is not for schoolboy fights and debating societies.
translation.zh: 整个生活都不适合小学生打架和辩论社团。

translation.en: His first act of sacrilege, he told us once, had been committed at the age of five when he embarked on a stormy argument with his mother, to the effect that when his right hand was soiled with eating, it would be cleaner to lift his tumbler of water with the left.
translation.zh: 他曾经告诉我们，他第一次亵渎神明的行为是在五岁时，当时他与母亲发生了激烈的争吵，大意是当他的右手被食物弄脏时，用左手举起他的水杯会更干净。

translation.en: Wickedness is ignorance, weakness What is the good of telling people they are weak?
translation.zh: 邪恶是无知，软弱 告诉人们他们软弱有什么好处？

translation.en: The "I" that remains then is omnipresent, all-pervading, the Self of all.
translation.zh: 剩下的“我”是无所不在的，无所不在的，是所有人的自我。

translation.en: The other monk is here; he is one of the nicest of men I see, and is quite a learned monk too.
translation.zh: 另一位僧侣在这里;他是我见过的最好的人之一，也是一个博学的僧侣。

translation.en: And, mind you, they are not always ignorant fools, but are men who will astonish you with the depth and breadth of their intellect.
translation.zh: 而且，请注意，他们并不总是无知的傻瓜，而是会以他们智力的深度和广度让你感到惊讶的人。

translation.en: The rapid growth of clubs and societies for the comparative study of religions and the investigation of spiritual truth is witness to your labour in the far West.
translation.zh: 比较研究宗教和探究属灵真理的俱乐部和社团的迅速增长，见证了你们在遥远的西方的劳动。

translation.en: For this very reason, the West is ever especially adroit in organised action, and so also the East is ever bold in search of the mysteries of the internal world.
translation.zh: 正因为如此，西方总是特别善于组织行动，东方也总是大胆地寻找内部世界的奥秘。

translation.en: The highest of all feminine types in India is mother, higher than wife. Wife and children may desert a man, but his mother never. Mother is the same or loves her child perhaps a little more. Mother represents colourless love that knows no barter, love that never dies. Who can have such love? — only mother, not son, nor daughter, nor wife.
translation.zh: 在印度，所有女性类型中最高的是母亲，高于妻子。妻子和孩子可以抛弃一个男人，但他的母亲永远不会。母亲也一样，或者更爱她的孩子。母亲代表着无色的爱，不懂得以物易物，永不消逝的爱。谁能拥有这样的爱？——只有母亲，没有儿子，没有女儿，也没有妻子。

translation.en: What good will lectures do in a country like India which has become the birthplace of disease, sorrow, and affliction, and where men are emaciated through starvation, and weak in mind?
translation.zh: 在像印度这样的国家，疾病、悲伤和苦难的发源地，人们因饥饿而消瘦，心智虚弱，在这样的国家里，讲课有什么好处呢？

translation.en: We roamed about the gardens and bathed in a still pool opposite the Pathan Khan's Zenana, and then we lunched in the first garden and rode down in the afternoon to Islamabad.
translation.zh: 我们在花园里闲逛，在Pathan Khan's Zenana对面的一个静水池里洗澡，然后在第一个花园里吃午饭，下午骑马去伊斯兰堡。

translation.en: When the wave rises on the top it is life; and when it falls into the hollow it is death.
translation.zh: 当波浪在顶部升起时，它就是生命;当它落入空洞时，那就是死亡。

translation.en: All of us want to get rid of misery; we are struggling to attain to liberty — physical, mental, spiritual.
translation.zh: 我们所有人都想摆脱痛苦;我们正在努力争取自由——身体上、精神上、精神上的自由。

translation.en: In the south, however, the spiritual upheaval of Shankara and Ramanuja was followed by the usual Indian sequence of united races and powerful empires.
translation.zh: 然而，在南方，Shankara 和 Ramanuja 的精神动荡之后是通常的印度联合种族和强大帝国的序列。

translation.en: Be pure, urged the speaker, give up superstition and see the wonderful harmony of nature.
translation.zh: 说话者敦促说，要纯洁，放弃迷信，看到大自然的美妙和谐。

translation.en: A fact, yet at the same time not a fact; awake and at the same time asleep.
translation.zh: 一个事实，但同时又不是一个事实;醒着，同时睡着了。

translation.en: It is a pleasure to observe that there is neither the attempt made here to retort on them, nor is there any display of meanness — as the refined writers of England are not in the habit of indulging in that kind of thing — but with a sober, dignified, not the least malignant, yet firm and thundering voice, worthy of the aged scholar, he has removed the charges that were levelled against some of the uncommon ideas of the great-soured sage — swelling forth from a heart too deep for ordinary grasp.
translation.zh: 令人高兴的是，这里既没有试图反驳他们，也没有表现出任何卑鄙的表现——因为英国的儒雅作家没有沉溺于这种事情的习惯——而是用一种清醒的、有尊严的、不是最恶毒的、但坚定而雷鸣般的声音， 不愧是这位年迈的学者，他消除了对这位伟大的圣人的一些不寻常的想法的指责——这些思想是从一颗太深而无法正常理解的心中涌现出来的。

translation.en: What I mean by breaking down religion is that religions that have held on to the idea of an extra-cosmic deity, that he is a very big man and nothing else, can no more stand on their feet; they have been pulled down, as it were.
translation.zh: 我所说的打破宗教的意思是，那些坚持宇宙外神的观念的宗教，他是一个非常大的人，没有别的，不能再站起来了;可以说，他们已经被拉下来了。

translation.en: The ship left the harbour in the evening, when I heard a great shout, and peeping through the cabin-window, I found that about a thousand men, women, and children of Madras who had been sitting on the harbour-walls, gave this farewell shout when the ship started.
translation.zh: 傍晚时分，船离开了港口，我听到一声巨大的喊叫声，我从船舱的窗户窥视，发现大约有一千名马德拉斯的男人、女人和孩子坐在港口的墙壁上，在船启动时发出了告别的呼喊。

translation.en: There are people in India who, if a baby dies, do not burn it, but bury it and build a temple over it; and that little baby becomes the god of that temple.
translation.zh: 在印度，有些人如果婴儿死了，不会烧掉它，而是把它埋葬，并在上面建造一座寺庙;那个小婴儿成了那座寺庙的神。

translation.en: If in ancient times Greek astronomers like Yavanâchârya could have been so highly esteemed by our Aryan ancestors, then it is incredible that this work of the lion of devotees will fail to be appreciated by my countrymen.
translation.zh: 如果在古代，像Yavanâchârya这样的希腊天文学家可以受到我们雅利安祖先的高度尊重，那么令人难以置信的是，奉献者的狮子的工作将无法得到我的同胞的赞赏。

translation.en: If Mother does not fulfil this prayer, sure She will take me across the water soon, and [line excised] .
translation.zh: 如果母亲没有实现这个祈祷，她肯定会很快带我过水，并[线被切除]。

translation.en: They knew a little, expected much from that little, and often tried to make too much of what little they knew.
translation.zh: 他们知道一点点，对那一点点期望很高，并且经常试图把他们知道的很少的东西做得太多。

translation.en: He cannot hear you because there is so much noise.
translation.zh: 他听不到你的声音，因为噪音太大了。

translation.en: But if superstition enters, the brain is gone, the brain is softening, degradation has seized upon the life.
translation.zh: 但是，如果迷信进入，大脑就会消失，大脑就会软化，堕落就会抓住生命。

translation.en: 4.6.6 A HYMN TO THE DIVINITY OF SHRI RAMAKRISHNA
translation.zh: 4.6.6 罗摩克里希纳神性的赞美诗

translation.en: Therefore you must wait, and yet I am sure there will be a few subscribers here.
translation.zh: 因此，您必须等待，但我相信这里会有一些订阅者。

translation.en: There are thousands of people who cultivate the study of this science, and for the whole nation it has become a part of daily worship.
translation.zh: 有成千上万的人培养这门科学的研究，对于整个国家来说，它已成为日常崇拜的一部分。

translation.en: I feel the real meaning of this prayer whenever I see a face upon which the finger of the Lord has written in unmistakable letters "mine".
translation.zh: 每当我看到主的手指用明确无误的字母写着“我的”的脸时，我都能感受到这个祈祷的真正含义。

translation.en: We see that the power of acquiring knowledge varies in each individual, and this shows that each one of us has come with his own fund of knowledge.
translation.zh: 我们看到，获取知识的能力在每个人身上都各不相同，这表明我们每个人都有自己的知识储备。

translation.en: Have fire and spread all over. Work, work. Be the servant while leading. Be unselfish, and never listen to one friend in private accusing another . Have infinite patience, and success is yours.
translation.zh: 有火并蔓延到各处。工作，工作。在领导时成为仆人。要无私，永远不要听一个朋友私下指责另一个朋友。有无限的耐心，成功就是你的。

translation.en: They have noticed some little activity of their own and others' minds and, without knowing anything about the real character of such superficial manifestations, have published them as facts universal in their application; and every religious and mystical crank has facts, data, etc., which, he claims, are reliable criteria for investigation, but which are in fact nothing more or less than his own imaginings
translation.zh: 他们注意到自己和他人的思想中的一些小活动，并且对这种表面表现的真正特征一无所知，就把它们作为普遍应用的事实发表出来;每个宗教和神秘的怪人都有事实、数据等，他声称，这些都是可靠的调查标准，但实际上只不过是他自己的想象

translation.en: The Songs of Solomon were cited by the lecturer as the most beautiful portion of the Christian Bible and yet he had heard with deep regret that there was a possibility of their being removed.
translation.zh: 《所罗门之歌》被讲师引用为基督教圣经中最美丽的部分，但他深感遗憾地听说它们有可能被删除。

translation.en: It was an awful mistake in the Greenacre programme that it was printed that Saradananda was there by the kind permission (leave of absence from England) of Sturdy.
translation.zh: 在格林纳克计划中，一个可怕的错误是，它被印刷成萨拉达南达在斯特迪的善意许可（离开英格兰）的情况下在那里。

translation.en: When there will grow a link of sympathy and regard between both nations by this give-and-take intercourse, there will be then no need for these noisy cries.
translation.zh: 当两国之间通过这种相互让步的交往而产生同情和尊重的联系时，就没有必要这些嘈杂的哭声了。

translation.en: The means to this civilisation is the sword; its auxiliary — courage and strength; its aim enjoyment here and thereafter.
translation.zh: 这种文明的手段是剑;它的辅助——勇气和力量;它的目标是在这里和以后享受。

translation.en: (A translation of the Nâsadiya-Sukta , Rig-Veda, X. 129.)
translation.zh: （Nâsadiya-Sukta的翻译，梨俱吠陀，X.129。

translation.en: The two great divisions of the Vedas are Karma Kânda — the portion pertaining to doing or work, and Jnâna Kânda — the portion treating of knowing, true knowledge.
translation.zh: 吠陀经的两大部分是业力坎达（Karma Kânda）——与做事或工作有关的部分，以及JnânaKânda——处理知识、真知的部分。

translation.en: The various kinds of worship of the various Devas are all to be included in ritualistic Karma, which gives to the worshipper only a particular result in the form of some celestial enjoyment, but can neither give rise to Bhakti nor lead to Mukti.
translation.zh: 各种天神的各种崇拜都包含在仪式业力中，它只以某种天体享受的形式给予崇拜者一种特定的结果，但既不能产生巴克提，也不能导致穆克提。

translation.en: Look again at the books published in Madras against the Hindu religion.
translation.zh: 再看看在马德拉斯出版的反对印度教的书籍。

translation.en: Swamiji: There is nothing wonderful in this universe.
translation.zh: 斯瓦米吉：这个宇宙没有什么奇妙的。

translation.en: Well, devoted sister, how about myself ? I came to India last fall, suffered all through winter, and went this summer touring through Eastern Bengal and Assam — through a land of giant rivers and hills and malaria — and after hard work of two months had a collapse, and am now back to Calcutta slowly recovering from the effects of it.
translation.zh: 好吧，忠诚的姐姐，我自己呢？我去年秋天来到印度，整个冬天都饱受折磨，今年夏天我走遍了东孟加拉邦和阿萨姆邦——穿过一片巨大的河流、丘陵和疟疾的土地——经过两个月的辛勤工作，我崩溃了，现在我回到加尔各答，慢慢地从它的影响中恢复过来。

translation.en: Anything that titillates our nerves for a moment we think; as the highest good, and plunge into it immediately, but find, when it is too late, that it has given us a tremendous blow.
translation.zh: 任何能刺激我们神经片刻的事情，我们都会想;作为最高的善，并立即投入其中，但发现，当为时已晚时，它给了我们巨大的打击。

translation.en: Each of them has its place in the development of the sum total of knowledge; and we must learn to estimate them according to their respective merits.
translation.zh: 它们中的每一个在知识总和的发展中都占有一席之地;我们必须学会根据它们各自的优点来估计它们。

translation.en: Many thanks for your kind note and the Nimbarka Bhashya — reached through Jaga Mohan Lalji.
translation.zh: 非常感谢您的友好留言和 Nimbarka Bhashya——通过 Jaga Mohan Lalji 到达。

translation.en: Therefore all human knowledge is uncertain and may be erroneous.
translation.zh: 因此，所有人类的知识都是不确定的，可能是错误的。

translation.en: Therefore, to gain this infinite universal individuality, this miserable little prison-individuality must go.
translation.zh: 因此，为了获得这种无限的普遍个体性，必须放弃这种悲惨的小监狱个体性。

translation.en: Place, time causation are all delusions. It is your disease that you think you are bound and will be free. You are the Unchangeable. Talk not. Sit down and let all things melt away, they are but dreams. There is no differentiation, no distinction, it is all superstition; therefore be silent and know what you are.
translation.zh: 地点、时间的因果关系都是妄想。这是你的疾病，你认为你是被束缚的，将是自由的。你是不可改变的。不要说话。坐下来，让所有的东西都融化掉，它们不过是梦。没有区别，没有区别，都是迷信;因此，保持沉默，知道你是什么。

translation.en: Disciple: But many are now preaching him as an Avatara.
translation.zh: 门徒：但现在很多人都把他当作阿瓦塔拉来宣讲。

translation.en: But then he crossed at one bound the ocean extending a hundred Yojanas, while we are crossing it confined within a wooden house, so to say, being pitched this side and that and somehow keeping ourselves on our feet with the help of posts and pillars.
translation.zh: 但后来他一口气渡过了延伸一百个Yojanas的海洋，而我们则被限制在一座木屋里，可以说，这边和那边倾斜，并以某种方式在柱子和柱子的帮助下保持我们的站立。

translation.en: If Jesus Christ was not perfect, then the religion bearing his name falls to the ground.
translation.zh: 如果耶稣基督不完美，那么以他的名字命名的宗教就会倒在地上。

translation.en: The members of the royal family in Austria and Russia are styled Archdukes and Archduchesses.
translation.zh: 奥地利和俄罗斯的王室成员被称为大公和大公夫人。

translation.en: Sattva binds through the search for happiness and knowledge, Rajas binds through desire, Tamas binds through wrong perception and laziness. Conquer the two lower by Sattva, and then give up all to the Lord and be free.
translation.zh: Sattva 通过寻求幸福和知识来束缚，Rajas 通过欲望束缚，Tamas 通过错误的感知和懒惰束缚。通过萨特瓦征服两个较低的人，然后将一切交给主，获得自由。

translation.en: Nag Mahashaya: I once asked Shri Ramakrishna about that, to which he replied, "Stay as a householder as you are doing." Therefore I am continuing in that life. I see you all occasionally and feel myself blessed.
translation.zh: Nag Mahashaya：我曾经问过 Shri Ramakrishna，他回答说：“像你现在一样做家主。因此，我继续这种生活。我偶尔会见到你们，觉得自己很幸运。

translation.en: Well, I have seen the bridge, and also, in the palace of the Setupati Maharaja of Ramnad, the stone slab on which Bhagavan Ramachandra installed his ancestor as Setupati for the first time.
translation.zh: 嗯，我看过这座桥，也看过拉姆纳德的 Setupati Maharaja 的宫殿，Bhagavan Ramachandra 第一次将他的祖先安装为 Setupati 的石板。

translation.en: He was riding on one occasion with the Raja of Khetri, when he saw that his arm was bleeding profusely and found that the wound had been caused by a thorny branch which he had held aside for himself to pass. When the Swami expostulated, the Rajput laughed the matter aside. "Are we not always the defenders of the faith, Swamiji?" he said.
translation.zh: 有一次，他和赫特里的拉贾一起骑马，当他看到他的手臂大量流血时，发现伤口是由一根带刺的树枝造成的，他把这根树枝放在一边让自己通过。当斯瓦米人开脱时，拉其普特人把这件事放在一边。“我们不是总是信仰的捍卫者吗，斯瓦米吉？”他说。

translation.en: According to the Yogis, there are three principal nerve currents: one they call the Idâ, the other the Pingalâ, and the middle one the Sushumnâ, and all these are inside the spinal column.
translation.zh: 根据瑜伽士的说法，有三种主要的神经电流：一种他们称之为 Idâ，另一种称为 Pingalâ，中间一种称为 Sushumnâ，所有这些都在脊柱内。

translation.en: And wicked people are trying to deceive him or her with all sorts of fooleries.
translation.zh: 恶人正试图用各种愚蠢来欺骗他或她。

translation.en: When you are trying to think of God, that is the very time these Samskaras appear.
translation.zh: 当你试图思考上帝时，正是这些轮回出现的时候。

translation.en: Consider a man looking at the sun from beneath the earth, up the shaft of a mine; he sees one aspect of the sun.
translation.zh: 想想一个人从地底下看太阳，在矿井的竖井上;他看到了太阳的一个方面。

translation.en: The sonship must come before we become one with the Father.
translation.zh: 在我们与父合而为一之前，儿子的身分必须到来。

translation.en: You have a great deal of power, and the power of control of the mind has especially been very little practiced.
translation.zh: 你拥有很大的力量，而控制心灵的力量尤其很少被实践。

translation.en: The next question is: Can such a unity be found? In India the attempt has been made from the earliest times to reach a science of religion and philosophy, for the Hindus do not separate these as is customary in Western countries. We regard religion and philosophy as but two aspects of one thing which must equally be grounded in reason and scientific truth.
translation.zh: 下一个问题是：能找到这样的统一吗？在印度，从最早的时候起，人们就试图建立一门关于宗教和哲学的科学，因为印度教徒不像西方国家那样把它们分开。我们把宗教和哲学看作是同一事物的两个方面，它们必须同样地建立在理性和科学真理的基础上。

translation.en: To many, these tremendous philosophical and logical propositions were alarming.
translation.zh: 对许多人来说，这些巨大的哲学和逻辑命题令人震惊。

translation.en: It voices both these views and takes things as they are.
translation.zh: 它表达了这两种观点，并按原样看待事物。

translation.en: A man must only build a house for "God and guests", to build for himself would be selfish; therefore he erects temples as dwelling places for God.
translation.zh: 一个人只能为“上帝和客人”建造房屋，为自己建造房屋是自私的;因此，他建造圣殿作为上帝的居所。

translation.en: But their time is come; and I fervently hope that the bell that tolled this morning in honour of this convention may be the death-knell of all fanaticism, of all persecutions with the sword or with the pen, and of all uncharitable feelings between persons wending their way to the same goal.

translation.zh: 他讲了几句关于克里希纳对佛陀的优先权。他还告诉西方学者，由于《毗湿奴往世书》中描述的王朝历史在一定程度上被承认为证据，从而揭示了古物学家的研究方式，因此，他说，印度的传统都是真实的，并希望西方梵文学者不要写虚构的文章， 应该尝试发现他们隐藏的真相。

translation.en: There is no word in any language to express this nearness except the word Oneness.

translation.en: If you can realise this, how infinitely more pleasurable that will be. What an ecstasy of joy! Which one body is so great that we need here anything [of] the body. . . After living in all the bodies of others, all the bodies there are in this world, what becomes of us? [We become one with the Infinite. And] that is the goal. That is the only way. One [man] says, "If I know the truth, I shall be melted away like butter." I wish people would be, but they are too tough to be melted so quickly!
translation.zh: 如果你能意识到这一点，那将是多么令人愉快。多么喜悦的狂喜！哪一个身体如此伟大，以至于我们在这里需要身体的任何东西。在生活在别人的身体里，这个世界上所有的身体里之后，我们变成了什么？[我们与无限合而为一。而且]这就是目标。这是唯一的办法。有一个人说：“如果我知道真理，我就会像黄油一样被融化。我希望人们会这样，但他们太坚韧了，不能这么快融化！

translation.en: As Swamiji was not keeping good health, he felt exhausted at this stage of his speech; so he took a little rest for half an hour, during which time the whole audience waited patiently to hear the rest of the lecture. He came out and spoke again for half an hour, and explained that knowledge was the finding of unity in diversity, and the highest point in every science was reached when it found the one unity underlying all variety. This was as true in physical science as in the spiritual.
translation.zh: 由于斯瓦米吉身体不好，他在演讲的这个阶段感到筋疲力尽;于是他休息了半个小时，在这期间，全场耐心地等待着听剩下的演讲。他出来讲了半个小时，并解释说，知识是在多样性中发现统一性，每门科学在发现所有多样性背后的统一性时就达到了最高点。这在物理科学和精神科学中都是如此。

It is a question of knowledge ! You must know what you are, and it is done. The dream vanishes. This you [and others] are dreaming here. When they die, they go to [the] heaven [of their dream]. They live in that dream, and [when it ends], they take a nice body [here], and they are good people....
translation.zh: 在这个世界上，除了上帝之外，没有什么是永恒的。救恩意味着知道真理。我们不会成为任何东西;我们就是我们。救恩〔来〕是因信，而不是靠工作。这是一个知识问题！你必须知道你是什么，它已经完成了。梦想消失了。这是你[和其他人]在这里的梦想。当他们死去时，他们去了[他们梦中的]天堂。他们活在那个梦里，[当它结束时]，他们[在这里]拥有一个漂亮的身体，他们是好人。

translation.en: I have been out of town a few days and have now come back all right — healthy as ever.
translation.zh: 我已经出城几天了，现在回来了——一如既往地健康。

translation.en: Two curious nations there have been — sprung of the same race, but placed in different circumstances and environments, working put the problems of life each in its own particular way.
translation.zh: 那里曾经出现过两个奇怪的国家——来自同一个种族，但被置于不同的环境和环境中，以自己独特的方式解决生活中的问题。

translation.en: The duty of every aristocracy is to dig its own grave, and the sooner it does so, the better.
translation.zh: 每个贵族的职责都是自掘坟墓，越早挖越好。

translation.en: Again, after a period, the whole thing is disturbed, projected outwards, and again it slowly goes down — like waves.
translation.zh: 再一次，过了一段时间，整个事物被扰乱，向外投射，然后它又像波浪一样缓慢下降。

translation.en: thou shalt not be coupled with anything connected with the flesh.
translation.zh: 你不可与任何与肉体有关的东西结合在一起。

translation.en: We weaken and again grasp for that superstition and help.
translation.zh: 我们削弱并再次抓住这种迷信和帮助。

translation.en: Therefore the absolute sameness of conditions, if that be the aim of ethics, appears to be impossible.
translation.zh: 因此，如果条件的绝对同一性是伦理学的目的，那么似乎是不可能的。

translation.en: Many of the customs of the country were sketched, and further it was shown how this country was the seat of civilization, the center of arts, the sciences, the philosophical thought of the world.
translation.zh: 勾勒出该国的许多习俗，并进一步展示了这个国家如何成为文明的所在地，世界艺术，科学和哲学思想的中心。

translation.en: She is there in the blood of every Hindu man and woman; we are all children of Sita.
translation.zh: 她存在于每个印度教男人和女人的血液中;我们都是悉多的孩子。

translation.en: You will at once understand that so long as a man is alive, he talks a living language, but when he is dead, he speaks a dead language.
translation.zh: 你会立刻明白，只要一个人还活着，他就会说一种活的语言，但当他死了，他就会说一种死的语言。

translation.en: They are as much the property of the lowest of the low, as they are the property of a Buddha, and as much the property of the smallest worm that crawls as of the Christ, because they are universal principles.
translation.zh: 它们既是卑微者的财产，也是佛陀的财产，也是爬行的最小的蠕虫的财产，就像基督的财产一样，因为它们是普遍的原则。

translation.en: Do not fret because the world looks with suspicion at every new attempt, even though it be in the path of spirituality.
translation.zh: 不要担心，因为世界对每一次新的尝试都持怀疑态度，即使它走在灵性的道路上。

translation.en: Because you have been talking sense things and are satisfied with sense-objects and with the mere ceremonials of religion, while I have known the Purusha beyond.
translation.zh: 因为你一直在谈论感官的东西，并且满足于感官对象和宗教的仪式，而我却知道超越普鲁沙。

translation.en: And this, the agnostic claims, cannot be reached, therefore he must give up the search.
translation.zh: 而不可知论者声称，这是无法达到的，因此他必须放弃搜索。

translation.en: While standing on this plane, we are bound each one of us to have a different view of the Absolute Reality; and as such, all views are true, and no one of us need quarrel with another.
translation.zh: 当我们站在这个平面上时，我们每个人都必须对绝对现实有不同的看法;因此，所有的观点都是正确的，我们任何人都不需要与另一个人争吵。

translation.en: They believed in nothing but the enjoyment of the moment, which eventually resulted in the most revolting orgies.
translation.zh: 他们只相信享受当下，最终导致了最令人反感的狂欢。

translation.en: I have no doubt this will go on increasing at this rate and the English people are steady and loyal.
translation.zh: 我毫不怀疑，这种情况会以这种速度继续增加，英国人民是稳定和忠诚的。

translation.en: As for Sanyal, I don't care who takes money or not, but I have a strong hatred for child-marriage.
translation.zh: 至于三亚，我不在乎谁拿钱不拿钱，但我对童婚有强烈的仇恨。

translation.en: The English people, who are so strong a race, who work so hard day and night, and whose native place is a cold country — even they hold in dread the very name of sweetmeats and food fried in butter!
translation.zh: 英国人，他们是如此坚强的种族，他们日夜如此辛苦地工作，他们的故乡是一个寒冷的国家——甚至他们都害怕甜肉和黄油油炸食物的名字！

translation.en: Supposing even your Highness opens a free school in every village, still it would do no good, for the poverty in India is such, that the poor boys would rather go to help their fathers in the fields, or otherwise try to make a living, than come to the school.
translation.zh: 假如殿下在每个村子都开办了一所免费学校，那也无济于事，因为印度的贫困程度如此之高，穷小子宁愿去田里帮父亲干活，或者以其他方式谋生，也不愿来学校。

translation.en: And all these little different beings, men and animals etc.
translation.zh: 所有这些不同的小生物，人和动物等等。

translation.en: No man has the right to cook food only for himself; it is for others, and he should have what remains.
translation.zh: 任何人都无权只为自己做饭;这是给别人的，他应该拥有剩下的东西。

translation.en: If there is but one religion to be true, all the rest must be true.
translation.zh: 如果只有一种宗教是真实的，那么其余的都必须是真实的。

translation.en: For, what conception of mercy could a man like me form who would go after a man if he steals anything from me and send him to jail?
translation.zh: 因为，像我这样的人，如果一个人从我这里偷了任何东西，把他送进监狱，他会追捕他，这能形成什么怜悯的概念呢？

translation.en: 7. The qualities are: Tamas (dullness, heaviness), Rajas (restlessness, activity), Sattva (serenity, purity); and the conditions are: Ârta (afflicted), Arthârthi (wanting something), Jijnâsu (searching truth), Jnâni, (knower).
translation.zh: 7. 品质是：Tamas（沉闷、沉重）、Rajas（不安、活跃）、Sattva（宁静、纯洁）;条件是：Ârta（受苦），Arthârthi（想要某物），Jijnâsu（寻求真理），Jnâni（知道）。

translation.en: "He goes from death to death who sees many in this world."
translation.zh: “他从死到死，他在这个世界上看到了许多人。”

translation.en: This world is utterly false; all the great teachers of the world found that out; there is no way out of it but through God.
translation.zh: 这个世界是完全虚假的;世界上所有伟大的导师都发现了这一点;除了通过上帝，别无出路。

translation.en: When it was causing fear that all India was going to be broken up between [the] two ... [groups], there rose this man Krishna, and in the Gita he tries to reconcile the ceremony and the philosophy of the priests and the people.
translation.zh: 当它引起人们的恐惧时，整个印度将在两者之间分裂......[团体]，克里希纳这个人崛起了，在吉塔中，他试图调和仪式以及祭司和人民的哲学。

translation.en: As for me, I am glad I have done something good and many things bad; glad I have done something right, and glad I have committed many errors, because every one of them has been a great lesson.
translation.zh: 至于我，我很高兴我做了一些好事，也做了很多坏事;庆幸我做对了，庆幸我犯了很多错误，因为每一个错误都是很好的教训。

translation.en: The Sultan of Turkey may buy a Negro from the mart of Africa, and bring him in chains to Turkey; but should he become a Mohammedan and have sufficient merit and abilities, he might even marry the daughter of the Sultan.
translation.zh: 土耳其苏丹可以从非洲的集市上买一个黑人，然后用锁链把他带到土耳其;但是，如果他成为伊斯兰教徒并有足够的功绩和能力，他甚至可能娶苏丹的女儿。

translation.en: Many men and women of the West are ready to do good to India by serving even the lowest Chandâlas, in the Indian way, and through the Indian religion.
translation.zh: 许多西方的男人和女人都准备为印度做好事，以印度的方式，通过印度宗教，哪怕是最底层的钱德拉人。

translation.en: You must feel for the millions of beings around you, and yet you must be strong and inflexible and you must also possess Obedience; though it may seem a little paradoxical — you must possess these apparently conflicting virtues.
translation.zh: 你必须对你周围数以百万计的众生有有感觉，但你必须坚强和不灵活，你也必须拥有服从;虽然这看起来有点自相矛盾——但你必须拥有这些明显相互冲突的美德。

translation.en: Universal methods have been organised according to different philosophers.
translation.zh: 根据不同的哲学家，已经组织了普遍的方法。

translation.en: Nag Mahashaya: What do you say, sir? You are the image of Shri Ramakrishna — the obverse and reverse of the same coin. Those who have eyes, let them see.
translation.zh: Nag Mahashaya：你说什么，先生？你是罗摩克里希纳的形象——同一枚硬币的正面和背面。那些有眼睛的人，让他们看到。

translation.en: Those children that come with curses, that slip into the world, just in a moment of inadvertence, because that could not be prevented — what can we expect of such progeny?
translation.zh: 那些带着诅咒而来的孩子，只是在一瞬间不经意间溜进了这个世界，因为这是无法阻止的——我们能指望这样的后代吗？

translation.en: All professions and business occupations were represented in the attentive audience — lawyers, judges, ministers of the gospel, merchants, rabbi — not to speak of the many ladies who have by their repeated attendance and rapt attention shown a decided inclination to shower adulation upon the dusky visitor whose drawing-room attraction is as great as his ability in the rostrum.
translation.zh: 所有职业和商业职业都代表着专心致志的听众——律师、法官、福音传道人、商人、拉比——更不用说许多女士了，她们一再出席和全神贯注地表现出一种坚定的倾向，即对这位昏暗的访客表示赞美，他的客厅吸引力与他在讲台上的能力一样大。

translation.en: Ay, therefore first know the secret of this Om, that you are the Om; know the secret of this Tattvamasi, and then and then alone whatever you want shall come to you.
translation.zh: 哎呀，所以首先要知道这个奥姆的秘密，你就是奥姆;知道这个Tattvamasi的秘密，然后，无论你想要什么，都会独自一人来到你身边。

translation.en: Q . Then you call those Brahmins who are Sâttvika by nature.
translation.zh: Q .然后你称那些婆罗门为天生的 Sâttvika。

translation.en: We shall come to understand that the secret of religion is not being able to think and say all these thoughts; but, as the Vedas teach, to realise them, to realise newer and higher one than have ever been realised, to discover them, bring them to society; and the study of religion should be the training to make prophets.
translation.zh: 我们将明白，宗教的秘诀在于不能思考和说出所有这些想法;但是，正如吠陀经所教导的那样，要实现它们，实现比以往任何时候都更新、更高的东西，发现它们，将它们带入社会;对宗教的研究应该是培养先知的训练。

translation.en: You find in Krishna that non-attachment is the central idea.
translation.zh: 你在克里希纳（Krishna）中发现，不执着是中心思想。

translation.en: And their forefathers looked just like the English, only living under the tropical sun of India has turned them black!
translation.zh: 他们的祖先看起来就像英国人一样，只是生活在印度的热带阳光下才把他们变成了黑色！

translation.en: 23. "I disagree with all those who are giving their superstitions back to my people. Like the Egyptologist's interest in Egypt, it is easy to feel an interest in India that is purely selfish. One may desire to see again the India of one's books, one's studies, one's dreams. My hope is to see again the strong points of that India, reinforced by the strong points of this age, only in a natural way. The new stage of things must be a growth from within.
translation.zh: 23. “我不同意所有将迷信还给我的人民的人。就像埃及学家对埃及的兴趣一样，对印度的兴趣很容易纯粹是自私的。人们可能渴望再次看到自己的书本、学习和梦想中的印度。我的希望是以一种自然的方式再次看到那个印度的长处，这个时代的长处加强了这些长处。事物的新阶段必须是自内而外的成长。

translation.en: Mistaking the rope for the snake, fear came [to a man] and made him call somebody else to kill the snake.
translation.zh: 他误以为绳子是蛇，于是恐惧来了，叫别人来杀蛇。

translation.en: Though such assertion is a partial exaggeration of fact, yet it is certainly true that if anyone has to give to the world any new idea, this Paris is the place for its dissemination.
translation.zh: 虽然这种说法是对事实的部分夸大，但可以肯定的是，如果有人必须向世界提供任何新思想，那么巴黎就是传播这种思想的地方。

translation.en: The Sannyasins have nothing to do with the two thousand ceremonies that the priests have invented: Pronounce certain words — ten syllables, twenty syllables, and so on — all these things are nonsense.
translation.zh: 桑雅生与祭司们发明的两千种仪式无关：发音某些单词——十个音节、二十个音节等等——所有这些都是无稽之谈。

translation.en: The living entity contains the possibility of all life, but can only express that which environment demands.
translation.zh: 生命体包含所有生命的可能性，但只能表达环境所要求的东西。

translation.en: About the higher mysteries of life and existence I can do no more than speculate, as others do.
translation.zh: 关于生命和存在的更高奥秘，我只能像其他人一样推测。

translation.en: These are the eternal words out of which the whole universe has been produced.
translation.zh: 这些是永恒的话语，整个宇宙都是从这些话语中产生的。

translation.en: Therefore he would suggest such a form of worship as getting some of these poor Narayanas, or blind Narayanas, and hungry Narayanas into every house every day, and giving them the worship they would give to an image, feeding them and clothing them, and the next day doing the same to others.
translation.zh: 因此，他会建议这样一种崇拜形式，比如每天把这些可怜的那拉亚那，或瞎眼的那拉亚那，和饥饿的那拉亚那人中的一些人带到每家每户，给他们敬拜，给他们一个形象，给他们吃饭，给他们穿，第二天对其他人做同样的事情。

translation.en: The gas, for a time, made him forget the consciousness of the body, and that very thing which he was seeing as the body, he began to perceive as ideas.
translation.zh: 有一段时间，这种气体使他忘记了身体的意识，而他所看到的身体，他开始将其视为思想。

translation.en: But if a man teaches a religion which presents the highest ideal, I am ready for him.
translation.zh: 但是，如果一个人所教导的宗教代表了最高理想，我就为他做好了准备。

translation.en: At one time my ideal was to drive a strong pair of horses; at another time I thought, if I could make a certain kind of sweetmeat, I should be perfectly happy; later I imagined that I should be entirely satisfied if I had a wife and children and plenty of money.
translation.zh: 曾几何时，我的理想是驾驶一对强壮的马;还有一次，我想，如果我能做出某种甜肉，我应该非常高兴;后来我想，如果我有妻子和孩子，还有很多钱，我应该完全满足了。

translation.en: Let me now address myself to you — take particular care to start a centre in Rajputana.
translation.zh: 现在让我对你们说——特别注意在拉杰普塔纳建立一个中心。

translation.en: "But you were just saying we are all the same, and you admit there is no difference in souls."
translation.zh: “但你只是说我们都是一样的，你承认灵魂没有区别。

translation.en: The speaker had asked through the length and breadth of the land what was the definition of civilisation, and he had asked the question in many countries.
translation.zh: 发言者问过这片土地的长度和广度，文明的定义是什么，他在许多国家都问过这个问题。

translation.en: The criminal law is always the law of the conquering nation, but the civil law remains the same.
translation.zh: 刑法永远是征服国的法律，但民法保持不变。

translation.en: Buddhism does not want to have anything except phenomena.
translation.zh: 佛教除了现象之外，什么都不想有。

translation.en: Nui's body became the sky, and her two hands and two legs became the four pillars of that sky.
translation.zh: 努伊的身体变成了天空，她的两只手和两条腿变成了天空的四根支柱。

translation.en: Congreave is the name of her nephew, and he is in the Transvaal war; that is the reason she underlined that, to show her nephew fighting the Boers in Transvaal. That was all. I cannot understand it any more now than then, of course.
translation.zh: 康格里夫是她侄子的名字，他在德兰士瓦战争中;这就是她强调这一点的原因，以展示她的侄子在德兰士瓦与布尔人作战。仅此而已。当然，我现在比那时更无法理解它。

translation.en: In Madras they throw away food if anybody looks at it.
translation.zh: 在马德拉斯，如果有人看到食物，他们就会扔掉食物。

translation.en: What we think, that our body becomes. Everything is manufactured by thought, and thus we are the manufacturers of our own lives. We alone are responsible for whatever we do. It is foolish to cry out: "Why am I unhappy?" I made my own unhappiness. It is not the fault of the Lord at all.
translation.zh: 我们的想法，我们的身体变成了什么。一切都是由思想制造的，因此我们是自己生活的制造者。无论我们做什么，我们自己都要负责。大声疾呼：“我为什么不快乐？我自己制造了不快乐。这根本不是主的错。

translation.en: Again, in one hymn we find that Indra has been given a very high position; he is omnipresent and omnipotent, and Indra sees the heart of every being.
translation.zh: 同样，在一首赞美诗中，我们发现因陀罗被赋予了非常高的地位;他无所不在，无所不能，因陀罗看到了每一个众生的心。

translation.en: In our country, he who has some means, feeds his children with all sorts of sweets and ghee-fried things, because, perchance, it is a shame — just think what the people will say!
translation.zh: 在我们国家，有钱的人会用各种糖果和酥油炸的东西喂养他的孩子，因为，也许，这是一种耻辱——想想人们会怎么说！

translation.en: What it should be is a grand mixture of all the different phases here.
translation.zh: 它应该是这里所有不同阶段的盛大混合。

translation.en: Do this either by work, or worship, or psychic control, or philosophy — by one, or more, or all of these — and be free.
translation.zh: 通过工作、敬拜、精神控制或哲学——通过一个或多个，或所有这些——来做到这一点，并且获得自由。

translation.en: Within ten years of his passing away, this power has encircled the globe; that fact is before you.
translation.zh: 在他去世后的十年内，这种力量已经环绕了全球;这个事实摆在你面前。

translation.en: What Hinduism had needed, was the organising and consolidating of its own idea.
translation.zh: 印度教需要的是组织和巩固自己的思想。

translation.en: I try to escape from this place every day; but they have been constantly putting it off for a long time.
translation.zh: 我每天都试图逃离这个地方;但他们已经不断拖延了很长时间。

translation.en: Great as a gentleman, as a scholar, as a poet.
translation.zh: 作为一个绅士，作为一个学者，作为一个诗人。

translation.en: We grasp something, and find it slips through our fingers, and then we grasp something else.
translation.zh: 我们抓住了某样东西，发现它从我们的指缝中溜走了，然后我们抓住了别的东西。

translation.en: But the Capitoline Hill is a mass of ruins, the spider weaves its web where the Caesars ruled.
translation.zh: 但是卡比托利欧山是一片废墟，蜘蛛在凯撒统治的地方织网。

translation.en: The answer will be certainly in the negative, and such a religion ought to be expelled at once, because it is productive of harm.
translation.zh: 答案肯定是否定的，这样的宗教应该立即被驱逐，因为它会产生伤害。

translation.en: If you yourself have a mind, then come sharp on receipt of this note.
translation.zh: 如果你自己有想法，那么在收到这张纸条时就要敏锐起来。

translation.en: Thus a certain motion becomes understood when it is referred to a force; certain sensations, to matter; certain changes outside, to law; certain changes in thought, to mind; certain order singly, to causation — and joined to time, to law.
translation.zh: 因此，当某种运动被提及力时，它就会被理解;某些感觉，对物质;法律的某些外部变化;思想上的某些变化，思想;某些秩序单独地，与因果关系相连，并与时间、法律相连。

translation.en: We cannot conceive of any higher enjoyment than that of love, but this word love has different meanings.
translation.zh: 我们无法想象还有什么比爱更高的享受，但爱这个词有不同的含义。

translation.en: From Kutubuddin down to the Mogul Emperors — all of them are Tartars.
translation.zh: 从库图布丁到莫卧儿皇帝——他们都是鞑靼人。

translation.en: Whatever helps to make the Vikâsha of the soul is good, and whatever makes it Sankuchita is bad.
translation.zh: 任何有助于使灵魂的 Vikâsha 成为好的都是好的，而任何使它成为 Sankuchita 的东西都是坏的。

translation.en: Disciple: Since you wish it, I shall try to do it.
translation.zh: 弟子：既然你愿意，我就试着去做。

translation.en: The finer the instrument, the greater the power. The mind is much finer and more powerful than the body. For this reason it is easier to begin with the body.
